chos kyis skur pa btab na ni/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhig dge slong gse dge slob ma dang dge tshul dang/ dge tshul ma 'gazhi ma mchis pa'i
pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na padi 'gyur lags )sapa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slong mas dge slong ma la gzhim mchis par dam pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cang 'gyur 'gas/
dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// dge slong mas dge slong la pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na mi 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// dge slob ma dang/ dge tshul dang )dge tshul ma la
gzhim mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na rtsar 'gyur lags nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slob mas dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dag slob ma dang/ dge tshul dang/ dge tshul ma
la gzhi ma mchis par mapa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na tsare 'gyuralags/ nyes byas so// dag tshul gyis dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge slob ma dang/ dge tshul dang/ dag tshul ma la gzhi
mamaches par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// dge tshul mas dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge slob ma dang dge tshul dang/ dge tshul ma la gzhi ma mchis
par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa baban par 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhage dge slong gsi bdag nyid kyis bris nas 'di skad ces yi ge 'di las ni 'di skad du khyod mi tshangs par
spyod pa'i pham pa byung zhes zer ro zhes mchin par 'gyur lags zhes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ btsun pa dge slong gse/ dge slong la gzhi ba mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab kyang/
dge 'dun lhag mar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags samaM yod de/ sngar ltung ba byung ba dang/ rku thabs su gnas pa dang/ dang po mi mthun pa can dang )mning dang )dge slong ma sun phyung ba la ni nyes
@#// byas so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa) btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa )lang dge slong gang khros shing zhe sdang bar gyur nas// /

tshe ci nas kyang 'di tshangs par song pa dang phral lo snyam nas )dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la/ gzhan gyi cha dang mthun pa ma yin pa pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa btab pa las/ de dus gzhan zhage
na dris kyang rung/ ma si kyang rung/ rtsod pa de yang gzhan gyi cha dang mthun pa ma yin pa yin la/ rtsod pa gzhan gyi cha dang mthun pa ma yin pas/ bag las bsams pa tsam kyi chos 'ga' zhig

yo blangs par gyur la)dge slong yang zhe sdang la gnas pas zhe sdang gse smras so zhe na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ja ste[？ ]gi nga ka ma nigazhi med pa ji lta ba bzhin du//
bag tsam la rgya char brjod par bya'o// sdom la bshes pa dang ni gsol ba dang/ gleng ba dang ni dran pa gnyis// bzhi pa 'jug dang smi/ 'dun pas kacig dang nam mkha' la//
'jug pa rgyas pa nyid du bya// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyisi zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun mthun pa dbye ba'i

phyir rtul bar byed cing/ dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug na dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad dus tshodang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun mthun pa dbya

[ba'i phyi'i tshul bar ma byed cagi/ dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug cagi/ tshodang ldan padage 'dun dang mthun par gyis shage/ dge 'dun mthun mi phyed//
kun tu dga' mi rtsod/mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing/ chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bu r gyural ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed pa bde ba dang reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis/ tshe dang ldan

pa khyod dge 'dun 'byed pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu 'di thong zhig ces bsgo bar bya'o// dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na/ gal tekazhi de gtong na delta na legs gal te migatong na gzhi'i
gtong bar bya ba'i phyir lanaganyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/ yang dag par bstan par bya'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo// yang dag par bstan pa na )gzhi de gtong
na de lta na legs gal te mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags b/ btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gas bshes pa'i tshig gis ma bsgo bar/ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar
bgyid na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags bka' stsal pa/ ma bsgo ba zhes bya'o/ bsgo ba 'chags lags sam nyabar 'khor mi 'chags te/ dge 'dun
la yang ngas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// btsun pa bshes pa'i tshig gas bsgo nas gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka'
[p]nabya@#/// stsal pa/ bsgo ba zhes bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nyabar 'khor 'chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa skad pa'i/
las ma bgyis par bshes pa'i tshig gis sgo bar bgyid na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma bso ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ma bskyob zhes bya'o// bsgo ba'achags lags sam/
nya khar 'khor mi 'chags te dge 'dun yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// btsun pa bsad pa'i las bgyis te bshis pa'i tshig gas bskong ba sgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma
bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags bka' stsal pa bsgo ba zhes bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nyi bar 'khor 'chags ta) dge 'dun la yang[']tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro// btsun
b+hU babasgyud pa'i las ma bgyis par dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi zhing zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang/ gti mug gis 'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchin cir 'gyur lags
nyes byas so// bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags bka' stsal pa/ bsgo bar mi bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags sam/ rtobar 'khor mi 'chags te dge 'dun la yang 'gal
tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bskrad pa'i las bgyis nas dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi zhing/ zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang gti mug gis 'gro ba dang 'dzags pa 'gro ba'o zhes mni
na mi 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsgo bar bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ bar 'gor 'chags te/
ga 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig ma klus dran par ma bgyis par/ bdag nyid bka' blo mi bde ba la gnas par bgyidan cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so//
bsgo bar bgyi ma/ 'on te bsko bar mi bgyi lags bka' stsal pa bsgo bar mi bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi 'chags so// btsun pa re zhig glongs shing dran
par bgyis pa las/ bdag nyid bka' blo mi bde ba la gnas par bgying na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa bsgo
bar bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags sam nye bar 'khor 'chags so// mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag rgas/ mtshams kyi slad rolan mchis pa la bsgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/
nyi bar 'khor ma yan no// mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa dag gis mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag la bsgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam nye b.ra'akhor ma yin no/ btsun pa re zhig
dge slong las brgyad pa mtshams kyinang namams pas/ mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa dag la bsgon/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong
da las brgyad pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas )mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa dag la bsgron/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi 3 ru ma/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// btsun
pa re zhig dge slong las brgyad pas mtshams mnan cing/ mtshams non par bgyis te mtshamasasu ma u0f7a nas bsgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi 3mi ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ nye bar
pa bso ba zhes bya'o// bsgo ba'achags lags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags so// btsun pa dge slong las baspyad par ma bskos pa zhig go/ mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa'i gang zag bzhi
bsladan/ bskrad pa zhes bgyi lags sam nyabar 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re zhig dge slong las brgyad par bskos pas mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa'i gang zag gzhi zhige bsnyad na/
N+NaM bskyud pa zhes bgyi lags sam gal te des re re dang/ gnyis gnyis dang/ gsum gsum nas brgyud kyi/ bzhir ma yin na bslad pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa dge slong las brgyad pas mtshams
la kyi nang phyogs pa'i mtshungs par gnas pa'i dge slongamachis pa dag gis/ dge slong bzhi zhoge la bsgo na/ bsgo bar yang chud la ltung ba gang du yang mi 'gyur zhing )des dge 'dun mi mthun
par yang mi 'gyur ba lta mas lags sam nye bar 'khor gal te phan tshun 'dun pa byon pas ra ro dang/ gnyis gnyis dang gsum gsum la bsgo'i/ bzhi 'a ma lanan yod do//
de ci'i phyir zhe na tshogs kyis tshogs kyi las dag byar mi rung bas so// las brgyud pa phyogs gcig na mchis pas gnas bzhi'i las thams cad bgyur rung lags sam nyabar 'khor 'di ltar
dge slong las byed pas gnas bzhi car gyi mtshams kyi mdo// khri 'am/ khri'u 'am/ re lde 'am/) re lde ljongs ranges kyis mnan te 'jug par gyur la gnas de dag na yang las 'di lta bu 'di lta ste/

bzhi'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang/ lnga'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang/ bcu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang/ nyi shu'i tshogru kyis bya ba'i las nye bar gnas par gyur na rung ngo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/de de dag kha cig gis ni
sa las byed pa yanel/kha tsage yin tshog skong ba yanano// sa la mchis pas nam mkha' lamachis pa rnams la bsgo na )bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam nye bar 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re zhig las bgyod
panam mkha' lamams la/ sa la mchis pa rnams la bsgonabasgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam)nye bar 'khor ma yin no// ji ltar dge slong la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du )
bslab pa byon pa dang/ dge slong ma la yang dag 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro/ dge slob ma dang dge tshul dang dge tshul ma rnams la ni nyes byas so// sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pal yang
nyes byas khon ste/ sngamabazhin no// de ltaran gzhung 'di ni dge 'dun lhag ma gsum la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya ba yin no// nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ kha che pa las dge 'dun lhag
ma rdzogs so// kasdom la mtha' dang lam dang rgyal ragis dang// phung po de bzhin lhag ma dang// kha dang sha bur dung hwags// bu ram mar gsar/
ma nges gnyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyi zhus pa/ btsun pa bcomaldan 'das kyis/ yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cig gcig pu
gtsagidang/ dben pa skyabs yod pan 'dod pa byar rung bar stan la 'dug par byed rung/ de la gal te dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tsheg dang ldan pas chosagasum po pham par 'gyur ba 'am/
N+NaM dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed las gang yang rung bas smras par gyur la/ dge slong gis 'dug par khas blangs na/ chos gsum po pham par 'gyur ba 'am/ dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed

las chos gang yang rung bas byed du gzhug rung dge slong de la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas chos gangarangabang gas smras par gyur pa'i chos de dang des dge slong de byed du gzhug ste/
da nim nges pa'i chos so// yang dge slong gang bud med kyi yul dang lhan cagi gcig pu gtsage dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'do ba byar mi rung bar stan la 'jug par byed cing/ de la gral
ta dag bsnyanam yade ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas/ chos gnyis po dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed las tshos gang yang rung bas byed du gzhug cing dge slong la dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i
tshig dang ldan pas chos gang dang gang gis smras par gyur pa'i chos de dang des dge slong de byed du gzhug ste/ de yang ma nges pa'i chos so zhes gsungs pagang lags pa btsun pa re zhig dge bsnyen
ma yadi rgyas pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhagi/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong mtha' dang po 'byin par bgyid par mthong ngo zhes mchi nA/ dge bsnyen

ma yade nges pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gas brgyadadu stsal ma/ byed du mi gzhug go/ de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du stsal tum migazhug ste/ re zhig del de na chen zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//
gal te 'di skad dus yod do zhes zer na gnyis ka naMba' bya ste gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug rung/ de de'i ngo bo nyide tshol du gzhug go )
'on te de 'di skad ces 'di mtha' dang po ni ma byung gi/ 'on kyang bdag gis mtha' gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa byung ba mthong ngo zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmad du gzhug go/ dang po
ji lta par/ ma gnyis pa dang 3 gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa rnams la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhage/ dge slong rnams kyi
rung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhage gas kha'i lam du nyams par bgyis pa mthong ngo zhes mtshin )dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis
@#/ 'bagyid du stsal tam byed du mi gzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du stsal pa/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhage de la che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di/
skad ces med do zhes zeran gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthunan dge bsnyanam yadi ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gas byed du gzhug cing dada'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du gzhug go/ 'on te
de 'di skad ces 'dis kha'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas te/ 'on kyang bshang ba'i lam dang/ gci ba'i lam du nyams par byas so zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmad du gzhug go/ ba'i lam/
du ji lta bar/ bshang ba'i lam dang/ gciba'i lam du yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mamasanas
'di skad ces btsun pa dag dge slong zhig/ rgyal gis ma zhig dang lhan cig tu nyams par brgyad pa bdag gis mthong ngo zhesamachin dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid
du stsal tam) byed du mi gzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la don che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te de 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/

gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste// gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed dugazhug tsang/ de de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du gzhug go/ 'on ted 'di skad ces 'das rgyal ragis dar
lhan cig tu nyams par nim byas n/ 'on kyang bram ze mo dang lhan cig tu nyams par gyur to zhes zer na dge slong la rmadadu gzhug go/ rgyal ragis mo dang ji lta bar/ bram ze mo dang/ rje'u rakasamo
dang ma sa dgisam dang/ dkar mo dang sngon mo dang sngo bsangs mo dang/ ring mo dang/ thung du mo dang/ sdu gu ma dang/ skam mo dang/ tshon mo dang/ lus ngan ma dang 'gro
ba dang/ 'jug pa dang/ 'agleng ba dang/ 'gyel ba dang yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o// btsun pa dag bsenam yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchisanas 'dri
skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhagi mtha' dang po'i phung po 'byon par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchin dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/
byad du mi gzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhig de la che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dribar bya'o// gal te 'di skad byas yod do zhes zer na gnyis ka la dri bar
bya ste gal te mthunan dag bstan ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing/ de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol dug khug go/ 'on te de 'di skad ces mtha' dang po'i phung pa ni ma byung
gi 'on kyang ltung ba'i phung po gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa dang/ lnga pa byung ngo zhes bya ba rgyas par brjod do// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhakaM/
[z]do/// dge slong rnams kyi drung du mams nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag kas dge slong zhagi dge 'dun lhag ma dang po 'byin par baspyod pa mthong ngo zhes mchin/ dge bsnyen/

[D• ]ma 'di ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nying tshol du stsal ma )migazhug ste/ ra zhagi de la de name zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri ba

bya'o/ gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug tsang/ de de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du
gzhug go/ 'on te da 'di skad ces dge 'dun lhag ma dang po ni ma byung gi 'on kyang dge 'dun lhag ma gnyasi pa dang gsum pa dang/ bzhi panas/ bcu gsum pa'i bar byung ngo zhes zer na/
we dge slong la rmad du gzhug go dang po la ji lta bar )dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa dang gsum pa nas/ bcu gsum pa'i bar la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yod
mas pa'i tshig dang ldan pas/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gas dge slong kasi khar nyams par brgyud pa mthong ngo zhes mchin/ dge bsnyen ma yod

ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gso brgyad du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nyide tshol du stsal ma/ mi gzhug ste/ re zhag de la don che zhe zla bka' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o//

gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yade ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gas byed du gzhug cing/ de de'i rang bzhin tshol du gzhug go/ 'on te 'di

skad ces bar ni nyams par ma byas kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis so'i phyi rol ma'i nang du khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na/ dge slong la ched du gzhug go/ btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhige/ dge slong
rnams kyi drung du mchas nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gso dgo slong zhigegaci ba'i lam du nyams par brgyad pa mthong ngo zhes mchin/ dge bsnyen ma de ches pa'i tshig gis brgyud du stsal tam/

byed du mi gzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nyide tshol du stsal tam/ migazhug sa) lo u0f8bzhage de laden tsho zhu bla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod de zhes zer na/ gnyes ga la dri bar bya

ste gal te mthunan dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing/ de de'i nga bo 'di tshel du gzhug go/ 'on te de 'di skad ces gci ba'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas kyi/

na kyang 'as brgya phrag tu khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmad du gzhug go btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces//
btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis bshang ba'i lam du nyams par bgyis pa mthong ngo zhes mchis na/ dag bsnyanam yid ms pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal ma/ byed
'ju mi gzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du stsal tam migazhug ste/ ri zhag de la de nama'i zla bka' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad cas yod do zhes zer na/

gi gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/ gal tomathunan dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gas byed du gzhug cing/ de de'i ngo bo nyidi tshul du gzhug go/ 'on te de 'di skad ces bshang ba'i lam du ni

@# nyams par ma byas kyi 'on kyang 'dis nub tshes kyi phrag tu khu ba phyung ngo zhes zeran dge slong la ched du gzhug go/ btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yade tshes pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams
kyi drung du mchis nus 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong shage dus ma yin par skyo ma 'thung ba mthong ngo zhes mchin/ dag pasnyanam yad ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du
stsal tam sbrubyed du mi gzhug ge/ de de'i ngo bo nyidi tshel du stsal tam mi gzhug/ 3 re zhag de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhe dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhu zer na/
gnyis ka ladri bar bya ste/ gal tamathunan dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug rud/ de de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du gzhug go/ 'on te de 'di skad ces dus ma yin par

rtsom ni ma 'thungs kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis ga kha ra'i chu 'thungs so zhes zer na dge slong la rmang gzhug go/ btsun pa dag bsnyenam yade rjes pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhagi/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du/
mkhi nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhagi bu ram chang 'thung ba mthong ngo zhes mchin/ dge bsnyen ma yadi ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi
gzhugage/ de de'i ngo bo nyidi tshel du stsal ya/ mi gzhug ste/ rizhigade la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyis ka la dri bar bya ste/

gal te mthunan dge bsnyen ma yadeces pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug rung/ de de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du gzhug go/ 'on te 'di skad ces dus dus ma yin par bu ram gyi chang ma 'thungs kyi
'on kyang 'dis sbugs kyi chu 'thungs so zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmad du gzhug go/
bam po bzhi pa// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhige )
dgeslong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhige dus ma yin par sha za ba mthong ngo zhes mchin dgo bsnyan ma yid ches pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/

byad du mi gzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nyidi tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ rezhage de la de na che zhi zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyis la dri bar bya ste/
ma zhagi rjes so zhes zer na dge slong la rmed du gzhug go/ btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/

[>btsun pa dag bdag gami dge slong zhige dusam lags par kha zas za ba mthong ngo zhes mchin/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal ma/ byed du mi gzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo

de tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ rezhage de la don chazhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyis ka la dri bar bya'o// gal te mthunan dag bsnyen ma yid

tshes pa'i tshig dang ldan u0f8bga gas byedadu gzhug cing de da'i ngo ba nyidi tshol du gzhug go 'on te 'di skad ces dus ma yin pa'i zas ni ma zos kyi)'on kyang 'dis mar thos so zhes zer na dge slong la rmad du

k+Sha kazhug go/ de lta bu'i dngos po ma nges pa dge bsnyenam yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ bden pa mthong ba smra ba kung dag yin pa de dag la/ dge slong la ched du gzhug go/ nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/
kha pa las ma nges pa dang ldan pa rdzogs so/
sdom la de nyid stor dang ka pa dang// sems 'khrugs byan gyis ma brlabs dang/ rung ba dang ni dus las 'das// mtshan dang
nas: zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag pa rung bar ma byas pa bcang bar bya'o// de las 'das par bcangs na spang ba'i ltung byed de zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa chos gos da nyid dgung bcu
'das pa lang lags la/ de nyide dkung gtsag bral ba yang lags pa lta mchis 'gas sam )rtsa bar 'khor yod de 'di ltar dge slong gsazhag bcu 'das pa'i chos gos byin gyis brlabs nas/
chos gos med par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu skya rengasa'achar bar byed na chos gos 'di ni zhag bcu 'das pa yang yan la/ zhag gcig bral ba yang yin no/ btsun pa re zhig dge slong gi spang ba'i chos gos
nyams par gyur na ltung ba bshags par bgyi 'am/ nye bar 'khor 'ba' zhig pa'i ltung ba bshags par bya'o// gal te ltung ba bshags lags nas slar rad na spang bar bgyis ma nye bar 'khor
ma lani no// btsun pa ri zhagi dge slong gi spang ba'i chos gos mes tshig gam zos par gyur na/ dum bu de dag spang bar bgyi lags sam nyabar 'a 'or ma yin te 2 'ba' zhig pa'i ltung ba bshags
par bya'o// 'on te kun nas khru gang ba zhig yanin spang bar bya'o// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis chos gos red nas/ dgung lnga len pa dang sems 'khrugs par gyur na gang nas bzung ste/ de'i
dgung bcu bgrang bar bgyi lags gang nas bzung ste/ rang gi sems phyi'i rnyed pa nas so// btsun pa dka slong gis chos gos brgyad dam dgu zhagi byin gyis ma brlabs/ rung bar ma bgyis par nam
[R]tsho'i bar du b.rungasan nongs par mi 'gyur ba lcams lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ dge slong gsi nyi ma re re zhig blos gos las byung ste/ gzhan byen byas
tshe brlobanago/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bcu las 'das po'i chos gos spang ba'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gse chos gos lhag pa dgung bcu las 'das par bcang
kyang spong ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nyi bar 'khor yod de 'di ltar gos kyi spyan rung bar gyur la chu mi rung bar gyur pa dang rgyu rung bar gyural sngon mi rung bar gyur pa

dang gany+tsi ka mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ngani jabal nga/ ba glang gi spu dang rakhaladang/ ri dgas kyi bal dang 'dres pa dang/ thags su ma btags pa ste/ de lta bu'i chos shes ni zhag bcu las
lhag par bcangs na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyisazhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag pa bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa btsun pa dge slong
[/ ]gas nam 'tsho'i bar du tshos gos lhag pa bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur bltamachis lags sam nye bar 'khor yod do// zhag bcu tshun chad du dus las 'das par gyur nago/ btsunapa chos gos

de nyad pacangasan ltung bar yang mi 'gyur la chos gos de nyid bcangs na ltung bar yang bar yang 'gyur ba ltams lags sam/ nyi par 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong de tshosagos nichen po 'chang na ltung
ba med la/ mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red de 'chang na ltung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gas chos gos rnyed nas rtag du bcu lags pa dang/ de'i mtshanagyur nas/ dge slong mar red nas
dgung bcu 'das na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa ra zhagi dge slong mas chos gos shaka ran nas dgung bcu ma lags pa dang mtshan gyur ti dge slong du red nas dgung
bcu 'das na cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhag dag sleng gas dgung bcu la dgung bcur 'du shes te skya rengs 'char bar bkyang natsar 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed
du 'gyur ro// dgung bcu la dgung ra cum lags par 'du shes na chu'i 'gyur lags ltung ba med do// dgung bcu ma lags pa la dgung bcur 'du shesan tsar 'gyur lags M nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ !
dgung bcu ma lags pa la dgung bcu ma lags par 'du shes na cing 'gyur lags ltung ba med do// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gis sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas su chos gos shag red la/ chos gos de
yang spang bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam 2 nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong gi chos gos spang ba yin la/ dge slong des kyang chos gos de ma spangs) bral bar ma byas zhes pa ma bshag
pa'i skabs su dge 'dun gyis su brkyang bting bar gyur la/ sra brkyang bting nas dge slong des chos gos gzhan zhig red na'o// btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas dgung bcu las lhag par tshes
gos lcag pa bcangs na rgya'i 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas dgung bcu las lhag par chos gos lhag pa bcas na ru'i
'gyur logs/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slob ma dang/ dge tshul dang/ dge tshul mas dgung bcu las 'das par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// sngar
ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te/ snga ma bzhanino/// sdom la dge 'dun gyis dang sa dang mtshams/ mnan pa dang nim gnang dang// mtshams ma bcad dang ma g.yegs
dang ba'atshon dang ni de bzhani mtshan// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong chos gos zin pas/
sra brgyang phyang na gal te chub gcig kyang chos gos gsum las mos gos gang yang rung ba dang mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'bral bar byed na dge 'dun gyis gnang ba ma gtogs te/ spang ba'i ltang
byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge 'dun gyi chos gos byan gyis brlab par gnang lags sam)nye bar 'khong mi gdung btsun pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig mchis na gtang
lags sam/ nyathar 'khor gnang ngo// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi chos gos byin gyis brlabs te/ chos gos ma mamaMs par mtshams kyi slad rol tu bral bar bgyid na/ ]
chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ sa gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dang bral nga zhes bya'o/ chos gos da srang bar bgyi lags sam nye bar
na ngor ma yin no// 'ba' zhig pa'i ltung byed bshags par bya'o/ btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos sa la bzhag ste/ nam mkha' la skya rengs 'char bar bgyid dam/ chos gosanam
mkha' la bzhag ste sa la skya rengs 'char bar bgyidi na chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags bka' stsal pa chos gos dang bral ba zhes
bya'o btsun pa re zhig dge slong gas chos gos mtshams kyi nang du bzhag ste/ mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya rengs 'ar bar bgyid dam chos gos mtshams kyi slad rol tu bzhag ste/ mtshams
kyi nang du skya rongs 'char bar bgying na chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes byago/ btsun pa re
zhig dag song gis mtshams mnan nam/ mtshams bzung nas mtshams su 'greng ngam mchis te/ mtshams kyi bar du chos gos bzhag nas skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na/ chos gos dang
bral ba zhes pakyi'am/ chos gos dngamabral pa zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa dge slong yang mtshams kyi nang nas chis la/ chos gos kyang
zhe ba'i
mtshams kyi nang na mams pa las/ chos gos de dang bral ba gyur ba lta mchase lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ mtshams bcod par bya ba chos gos dang mi 'bral
ba'i sdom pa ma byan no// btsun pa re zhig mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas su gang tshun chad dge slong chos gos dang bral pa zhes bgyi )nye bar 'khor ji tsam) btsug lag khang gi nye 'khor chab nga
sa ma sgo khyams sam/ khang phran nam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am 3 dge slong gsikun tu spyadag lam/rab dag/ 'greng rab bam 'obs yod pa'o// btsun pa dge slong khang gnas gtsug la/ ste
g.yogs kyang gtsagi pa zhage na mchis la/ de nyid na chos gos kyang mchasen/ chos gosade dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar gan de chu stags can sna tshogs dang/

b+h+yA dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ spyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyu rnams sam spyan nor bgos pa rnams kyi yin na'o// btsun pa rig song gse mtshamasakyi slad rol la mtshams kyi slad rol tu 'du shes ngas/
skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na ca'i 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro// mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi slad rol chu 'du shes na tsari 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// mtshams kyi slad roT/

kyi nang du chos gas ga zhig ste mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya rengs shar bar bgyis pa las/ mtshanagyur te dge slong mar re da na tsari 'gyur lag/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhag dag/
slong ma zhig gso mtshams kyi nang du chos gos bzhag la mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya rengs 'char bar bgyid pa las/ mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du med na cir 'gyur lags sdang ba'i lcang khyad
du 'gyur ro// btsun pa dge slong ga sa gang gi mdun du chos gis byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor dge slong gse ni/ dge slong gi mdun du chos gos byan byase bab par bya'o// btsun pa

dge slong mas gang gi mdun du chos gos rgyani rgyas brlab par brtsi nye bar 'khor dge slong mas ni/ rag slong ma'i mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bya ste dbyung ba dang rung bar bya ba yang de bzhin
du bya'o// btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal ba chos gos ma masi par mtshams kyi slad rel du skya rengs 'char bar bgyid natsari 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ti) de bzhin du dag/
slong ma la ni chos gos lngas spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dag slob ma dang/ dge tshul dang/ dge tshul ma rnams la ni nyes pa med do// sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te )
snga ma bzhin no// kasdom lasems 'khrugs pa dang dus las 'das de bzhin rung ba nyid dang ni mi rung ba dang gdang ba dang/ tshod dang bzhi ni dag dang mtshan// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das la/ dad ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong chos gos bran pas chos[︽]sa sra brkyang phyang nas/ dus ma yin ra la
[D] gos red 'a 'dod na dge slong des chos gos de blang bar bya'o// blangs nas gal te las namyur ba kho nar tshos gos su byas te bcang bar bya'o// gal te mi langs la kha ma langs pa bskong ba'i shes
la re ba yodan lang/ dge slong des chos gos de zla ba gcig gi bar du klazhag par bya'o// de las 'das par 'jog na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa btsun pa re zhig dge
slong gsi chos gos bgage rnyed ma thag tu sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ gang nas bzung ste/ de'i zla ba bgrang bar bgyi/ gang nas bzung/ rang gi sems phyi rAd pa nas// btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis zla bgacig gi bar du chos gos gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa btsun pa dge slong gis nam 'tsho'i bar du chos gos kazhag kyang ltung bar mi
'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yodar/ zla ba gcig tshun ma du dus byas dko/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyase/ dge slong gis chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par
bya zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa chos gos de ji lta bu zhig lakas/ bdun po dag las btags pa gang yang rung ba ngas rjes su gnang zhing mkhokag pa gong yin pa'o// khatsun pa bcom
0ldan 'dasakyis// dge slong gas chos gos zla ba gtsug gi bar du gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis dgung zla gcige las lhag par gzhag kyang spang pa'i ltung
byang dum 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam) nyi bar 'khor yod de/ de 'di ltar chos gros kyi snyan rung bar gyur la rgyumi rung bar gyur pa dang/ spyan me rung bar gyur la rgyu rung bar gyur pa dang/
gnyis ka mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang pa glang gi spu dang 2 ri dgas kyi bal dang ra bal dang 'dresapa dang thags sum btags pa ste/ de lta bu'i chos gos ni zla ba gtsage/
las lhag par gzhag kyang nyes byas su 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gas chos gos de zla ba gtsug gi bar du gzhag par bya'ozhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa/
dge slong gse dgung zla drug tu chos gos gzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis 'gos sam nye bar 'khor yod do// chos gos de rnyed nas zhag sum cu lon pa dang dge 'dun gyis sa brkyang bting
bar gyur na'o/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ chos gos gsum du ma tshang na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhug go zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gang chos gos gsum tshang bar gyur
pa des/ chos gos mi langs pa zhig rnyed na/ des kyang dgung zla gcig gi bar du gzhag par bgyi lags sam)nye bar 'khor ma ya ni no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor chos gos gsum tshang na//
chos gos gzhan redapa gang yin pa ni langs kyang rung mi las kyang rung ste/de thams cad ni zhag bcu pa yin no// chos gos gsum du mtshang ba las gal tu chos zhes su
langs pa zhig rnyed na de yang zhag bcu nga yin no// 'on te ma langs pa zhig redan zla bgatsug gi bar du gzhag par bya'o// de las 'das par gzhag na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun
pa ra zhage dge slong gsi dgung zla gcig la gcig tu 'du shes pas/ skya rengs 'char bar bgyiden pa'i 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dgung zla gcig lo dgung zla kagi ma lags/
bar 'du shes na du'i 'gyur lags ltung ba med do// dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla gcig tu 'du shesan ra 'gyur lags nyes byas/ dgung zla gtsug ma lags pa la dgung zla gduge
sh+tsa ma lags par 'du shes nacir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas dgung zla gcig lags pa las mtshan gyur te[） ]dge slong mar red nas dgung zla gcig
las 'da' bar bgyiden tsa'i 'gyur 'gas/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong mas ches shes rnyed nas dgung zla gcig lags pa las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red nas
dgung zla gcage las 'da' bar bgyid na cari 'gyur lags) spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas chos gos dgung zla gcig pas rang du gzhag na tsar 'gyur lags )

dge slong ma tha dad du gnas pa dang )dge slong ma las len pa dang ma ning mo dang/ dge slong sun phyung ba dang/ ma 'a gums pa dang/ pha 'gums pa dang/ ) dgra bcom pa 'a gums pa dang/ mu stegs

bzhilan lnga lan zug gi 'og tu slong bar brgyad tsang/ chos gos de grub na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong mas chos gos bsgrub pa'i slad du//
kyi lan bzhi/ lanalnga lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cadi chos gos de grub na nu'i 'gyur 'gas/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur re// dge slob ma dang dge tshul dang dag tshul ma dang/
sngar ltung babyung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas su brjod do/// sdom la gzhon rgyas gzhan gyi 'phrodang ni khyim pa nyid dang mu stegs 'gro// mi rung ba dang mtshan dang no/ bzhi tshan bde
ga shags bdun tshanano// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshadang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang srani b.lakyi stan sar pa byed

wA na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gis gzhan la srani bal gyi snyan sar pa brgyad du stsal na tsari 'gyur lags zhes byas so// kazhan dag gi
slad du bgyid dustsa ban cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa ra shage dge slong gis gzhan la srin bal gyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsalan re 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// gzhan dag gi slad du bskyed
du stsal na tsami 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa ri zhagi dge slong gis gzhan gyis sranibal gyi stan bgyis pa'i 'phro lags par bgyase na ca'i 'gyur lags zhes byas so/ mdun du khyim pa
la bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slob ma dang/ dge tshul dang/ dge tshul ma dang bslab pa stsal ba dang/ dang po mi mthun pa can dang/ sngar ltung ba byung
ba dang rku thabs su gnas pa dang tha dad du gnas pa dang gnas par mi bya ba nas khas len pa'i bar la bgyid du stsalan cir 'gyur lags) spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa ri zhag dag
slong gis 'di las phyi mo'o pa gzhan mu stags can dang dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang spyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyu rnams la sun bal gyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na ming 'gyur lags 3 snga drung pa'i
ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gis 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la )srin bal gyi stan sarapa bgyid du stsal na mi 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhage dag/

slong gas sraniba' gyi stan sar pa brgyas kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba ltamangs lags sam) nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar stan de'i spyan rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung ba dang/ rgyu rung/
bar gyur la/ sngon mi rung ba dang gnyis ka mi rung ba rna bal dang/ ba glang gi spyi dang ri dwags kyi bal dang ra bal dang/ 'dres pa rnams 'dres brgyaden ca'i 'gyur lags/ nyis byas M so//
btsun pa re zhig dgo slong gis bal lam )shan 'am/ ras pal lam gso pal dang 'dres pa rnams las bgyid du stsal na cir 'gyur lags )nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhaki dge slongagis
srani bal dulam 'am kha 'i dar 'dres pa las bgyid du stsal na tsare 'gyur lags sa dus so/ ma brtags pa las brgyad du stsal na nu'i 'gyur lags/ zhesabyas so//

[） ]btsun pa re zhage dge slongasrani bal gyi stan sar pa brgyad du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar reng nas lags par brgyad na ra'i 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhage

ka slong ma sun phal gyi stan sar pa bgyid du stsol ba las mtshon gyur te/ dge slong du red nas 'gas par bkade na tsari 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re 'ge dge slong gis srin
bal gyi stan sar pa las srin paladu 'du shes pas brgyadedu stsalan bu'i 'gyur lags/ ngab ltang byed du 'gyur ro// srin pal la srin b.lam lags par 'du shes pas bgyid du stsal na ca'i 'gyur
N+NaM lags/ltung ba med do// slanibalam lags pa la srani bal du 'du shes pas bgyid du stsal na de 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// sran ngalam lags nga la sran bal ma lags par 'du shes pas
bgyid du stsalan 'di 'gyur lags )ltung ba med do// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gis bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi snyan bgyid du stsalan cing 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa stanagyi

tshad ji tsam lags/ nyapar 'khor ston gyi tshad gsum ste chen po dang/ 'bring dang chung ngu'o// de la chan po'i tshad ni khru phyed dang lnga pa 'o// chung du ni khru phyed dang gsum pa'o// de'i b.ro ma ni 'bring
po'o// btsun pa re zhage bsnyen par ma rdzogs par ston brgya bar sbyor bar bgyis la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na tsa'i 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba
bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na ri 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bkyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par brgyadin tsare 'gyur lags/
nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs kar spyod pa bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyid na ri 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bkyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs
nas lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba brgyas la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyidan cir 'gyur lags spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bkyise la) bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags par bkyang na cir 'gyur 'gas nyes byas so/// sdom la/ pho nya yi ge lag brda dang/ gzhan la snyad 'dogs
brgyud pa dang// smyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang// tshor ba 'on pa kun pago ba tsun pa ra zhage dge slong gis pho nya las srin bal gyi stan sar pa brgyad du stsolan par 'gyur lags/ nyes
byas so// de bzhin du yi ge dang lag brda dang/ gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang brgyud pa dang/ smon pa dang )sams 'khrugs pa dang/ tshor bas nyam thag pa dang 'on pa dang/ glen pa la/
mi 'gyur legs )nyes byas so// ji ltar dge slong gas srin bal gyi stan byed du bcug na/ sbyang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba de bzhenadu/ bslabang byin pa dang/ dge slong

ma la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slob ma dang dge tshul dang/ dge tshul ma dang sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa
nya bar 'khor gyis zhus pa btsun pabcom ldan 'das kyis )rang dge slong gang 'gru bal nag po'aba' zhig gi stan sar pa byed na nga ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang 'gran pa zhes

bya ba ste/ gzhung lhag ma ni srin bal gyi spang ba'i ltung byed du ji lta bar bal nag po 'ba' zhig pa'i ltung byed la lang da lo na bzhin du smArgyas pa rjod do// de la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na/ bzhi
tshan la lug bal nag po 'ba' zhige la/ nag po 'ba' zhig par 'du shes pas ston sar pa brgyad du stsolan zhes bzhi tshan du bya'o// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nyang r 'khor
gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong stan sar pa byed pas chagos na lug pa' nag po 'ba' zhagi las kazhug par bya/ gsum pa ni dang po las bzhi pa ni 'khob bal
las gzhug par bya'o// gal tadage slong gsi cha gnyis lug bal nag po 'ba' zhage las ma bcug gam/ gsum pa dkar po las/ bzhi pa 'a khob bal las ma bcug par stan sar pa byed na/
spong ba'i ltung byed do zhesakasungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste/ gzhung lhag mnisan bal kyi spang ba la ji lta bar mganyos kyi spang ba la yang brjod par bya'o// de la bla dad du bu ci yod
dge slong zhis lug bal dkar po dang/ 'khob pal nyung ba la yang nyung bar 'du shes )lug bal nag po 'ba' zhagi mang ba la yang mang bar 'du shes stan sar pa bgyid du stsolan sa bzhi
tshan du brjod par bya'o// gsakar yang dge slongam la ni nyes byas su brjod par bya'o// sdom la: gzhan las gzhan gyi 'phro dang ni// khyim pa mu stegs can 'gro dang//
mi rung ba dang tshan dang ni// bzhi tshan bde gshegs bdunatshanano// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor rgyasi zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kya45/
dgeslong stan sar pa byed pas mi 'dod bzhin du lo drug tu bcang bar bya'o// gal te dge slong gses lo drug tshun chad du stanArUdipa de spangs kyang rung ma sngangs kyang rung stan sar ngad gzhan byed
na: dge 'dun rgyab gnang bam ka togs te) spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gis gzhan la stan sar pa brgyad du stsalan cir 'gyur lags phreng ba'i ltung
byed du 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi slad du stan sar pa brgyad du stsalan care 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis gzhan gyi stan 'phro lags par bgyaden tsari 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/
nyu// dmadun du khyim pa la stan sar pa brgyad du stsal na tsami 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dbazhin du dka slob ma dang/ dge tshul dang/ dge tshul ma rnams dang
bslab pa stsal ba dang/ dang po mi mthun pa can dang/ sngar ltung ba byung ba dang rkuthabs su gnas pa dang/ tha dad du gnas pa dang gnas par mi bya ba nas/ khas len pa'i bar la stan sar pa bkyade
stsolan cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhog dge slong gis 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ spyod pa pa la stan sar pa bgyid
du stsol na ni 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa dag la stan sar pa bgyid du stsol na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so//

btsun pa re zhige dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du/ stan sar pa bgyid du stsal kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lagos sam)nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar stan de'i sman rung bar gyur

tho la rgyu mi rung ba dang/ rgyu rung ba dang 1 spyanami rung ba dang/ gnyis ka mi rung bar gyur na// mi rung ba rna bal dang ba glang gi spudang ri dgas kyi ngal dang ra bal dang/ 'dres pa las bgyid du

stsalan cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong dgung lo drug tshun chad du stan sar nga brgyad du stsol ba las mtshon gyur te/ dge slong mar red nas lags par bgyidan tsa'i 'gyur 'ag ]

wa nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong ma dgung lo drug tshun chad stan sar pa bgyid du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red nas lags par bgyis na nu'i 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung khyad du
'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gis dgung lo drug lonapal) lon par 'du shes pas stan sar da brgyud du stsal na rung 'gyur 'gas/ ltung ba med do// lon pa la ma na par n du nyin rer
'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// ma lon pa la len par 'du shes na car 'gyur lags ltung ba med de// ma 'an pa lam len par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dgung lo drug tshun chad du/ bde bar gshegs pa'i tshes gos kyi tshad kyi na sar pa brgyad du stsal na rung 'gyur lags nyes byas so/ pa tshun pa bsnyen pa ma rdzogs/
par dgung lo drug tshun chad du snyan sar par bgyi bar sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyid na tsa'i 'gyur lags/nyes byas so zhes bdunatshan rgyas pas brjod par bya'o//
sdom la pho nya yige lag brda dang// gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud dag dang// smon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang/ ri ba 'on pa glen pa 'o/ btsun pa re 3gi dge slong gses dgung lo
drug tshun chad du) pho nya las snyanasar pa brgyad du stsalan tsari 'gyur gas/ nyes byas so/ de bzhin du yi ge dang lag brda dang kazhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang/ brgyud pa byung : smon pa dang so mas
'khrugs pa dang/ tshong bas nyam thag pa dang thun pa dang 3'on pa la stan sar pa bgyid du stsal na rung 'gyur lags nyes byas so// ji ltar dge slong gis lo drug tshun chad du sten/

sar pa byas na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du gyur ba de bzhin du/ bslab pa byin pa la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong ma la ni nyes byas so// dge slobam dang/ dge tshul dang/ dge tshul ma dang sngar
ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni sa byas su brjod par bya'o sdom [' ]gzhan las kuzhan kyi 'dra dang ni// khyim pa mu stegs 'gro ba dang/ mi rung ba dang mtshan dang ni// dbazhinabazhitshan
bdun tshanano// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 27 tshe dang ldan pa nyi mar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ka slong kadange ba sar pa byed pas sar pa kha dog mi sdug par

bya ba'i phyir/ gdang ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mthokang 'khor ba'i glan par bya'o// gal te dge slong gis kha dog sar pami sdug par bya ba'i phyir/ gdungab rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang bor
bsam glan par gdang ba sad pa spyod na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis bde bar gshegs pa'i mthor sor gcig gam/ sor phyed kyis mi
'tshal bar gzhan zhagi las gdang ba sar pa bgyid du stsol cing spyod na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// gzhan gyi slad du gdang ba sar pa bgyidan tsa'i 'gyur lags )nyes byas so// gzhan gyi 'phro lags

[f]par bgyis te spyod na ri 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// mdun du khyim pa la gdang ba sar pa brgyad du stsol cing spyod na cari 'gyur lags phreng ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dag slob ma dang/ dge

tshul dang/ dge tshul mi dang )bslab pa stsal ba dang )dang po mi mthun pa can dang/ star ltung ba byung ba dang rku thabs su gnas pa dang/ tha dad du gnas pa dang gnas par mibya ba nas khas len pa'i bar

gdang ba sar pa bgyid du stsol rung spyod na nur 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang/ spyod pa

pa dang kun tu rgyu la gdang kha sar pa bgyid du stsol rung spyodan ci'i 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'grob kazhan du gnas pa rnams la gdang bsar pa bgyid du stsol na nur 'gyur lags/ nyis

byas so// btsun pa re zhage dge slong gso bde bar gshegs pa'i mthong sor gtsug gam sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar kadang ba sar par bgyid du stsolatsang stod kyang/ spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta

mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar gdang ba sar pa de'i sngon rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung ba dang/ spyan mi rung bar gyur la rgyu rung ba dang )gnyis ka mi rungabor gyur na'o/ mi rung ba/
ni rnga bal dang/ ba glang gi spyi dang/ ri dgas kyi bal dang/ ra bal dang 'dres pa dang/ ma btags pa ste/ de lta bu'i gding ba sang pa byed du 'jukaM tsang spyod na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro
'dul ba gzhung blo ma/// bam podrug pa// btsun pa re zhage dge slong bde bar gshegs pa'i mthor ser gcika kam) sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal par
kyi gding bsar pa brgyad du stsol ba lasamtshan gyur ta) dge slong mar red nas srid na rur 'gyur lags nyes byas so/ btsun par zhag dge slong ma bde bar gshegs pa'i mthor sor gcig gam/

[– ]ser phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar gdang ba ser pa baspyad du stsol ba las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red nas spyod na tsari 'gyur lakas spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhage dge slong gis/ bde bar
gshegs pa'i mtho gang du mi 'tshal ba la mi 'tshal bar 'du shes pas kun te gdang ba sarar spyad na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// mi 'tshal ba la lhag par 'du shes pas glan/
te dran par 'gyur lags ltung ba med do// lhag pa la mi tshal par 'du shes pasakun tu spyad na bde 'gyur lakas nyes byas so// lhag pa la lhag par 'du shes pas kun te spyad na cing 'khyur a ka/
ltung ba med de// btsun pa re zhigi bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bde bar gshigs pa'i mthor sori kag gam/ sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar gdung ba sar pa bkud du stsal ba'i sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par
ma rdzogs par bgyis na tsa'i 'gyur lags 3 nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyas la )bsnyen par rdzogs kar lagrwa par bgyas na nur 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ bstan par ma
rdzogs par sbyor pa bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas legs par bgyis na nu'i 'gyur 'gas/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzo gsar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyis na
nu'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyise na byar 'gyur lags/nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba
bgyis la/bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyisan tsari 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na
ru'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// sdom la3pho nya yi ge lag brda dang// gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang// smon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang// tshor ba 'on pa gyen pa'o//
btsun pa re zhage dge slong gis bdabar gshegs pa'i mthong sor gcig gam/ sor phyed kyis mi 'tshal bar pho nya las gding ba sar pa brgyad du stsal cing spyod na cir 'gyur lags) nyes byas so//
de bzhin du yi ge dang/ lag brda dang )gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang/ brgyad pa dang/ skyon pa dang/ sems 'khrugs pa dang/ tshor ba nyam thag pa dang/ glen pa dang 'on nga la gdung ba ser pa

bkyid du stsol cing spyod na nu'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// ji ltar dge slong gsegading bsar pa byed du 'jug cing spyod na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba ltar bslab pa khyen pa la yang de dang 'dra'o//
dge slong ma ni byed du 'jug cing spyod na nyes byas so// dag slob ma dang )dge tshul dang/ dge tshul mi dang/ sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//
sdom la: nam mkha' rdzu 'phrul sprul pa dang// de bzhin du sngags rnams gzhan gsum dang/ dmirung gnyis chenatshan dang ni// bzhi tshan pa ni tha ma yin// sangs rgyas bcomaldan 'das la/

tshadang ldan pa nyapar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lam du zhugs pas/ lug bal dag rnyed la 'dodan dge slong des blang bar bya'o// blangs nas khyer med na dpag tshad gsum gyi
mtha'i bar du bdag nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o// da las 'das par khyer na spang pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gas dpag tshadagasum las 'das par ma

N+NaM mkha' sa lug bal 'tshalan cir 'gyur lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyis khyer na ltung ba med do// 'on ta rnam pa gzhan gyis khyer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// rung ba brgyad pa sngal pas dpag tshad gsum las 'das
par 'tshalan cir 'gyur lakas nyes byas so/ btsun pa re zhagi dgeslong gis gsang sngags sam sman gyis bdag nyidamigada' bar bgyis te) dpag tshad gsum lasaM 'das par lug ngal 'tshol na ci
'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// gzhan gyi slad du dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal 'tshal na cir 'gyur lags )nyes byas so// gzhan las dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal bskur na
dar 'gyuralags/nyes byas so/ btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gas dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal 'tshal kyang/ spang ba'i ltung byed du ma 'gyur pa lta mas lags sam/nye bar 'khor lod de/

'di ltar dge slong lam du zhugs pa zhige gis lug bal dag rnyed nas/ des de dag dpag tshad gsum gyi bar tu bdag nyid kyis khyer ba las/ des yang lug b.lagazhan zhake rnyed nas/ des snga ma bor rta phyim khyer/
nas 'grona'o// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lug bal ma btogs pa de las gzhan mi rung ba rdza bal dang/ ba glang gi lnga dang ri dgas kyi b.ladang/ ra bal dang 'dres par dpag tshad gsum las 'das
par 'tshalan cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das par 'tshal ba las mtshanagyur te/ dge slong mar radanas mtshams las 'das
na ri 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun par 'gi dge slong mas lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das par 'tshal ba las mtshanagyur te dge slong du red nas mtshams las 'das na tsari 'gyur
lags/ spang ba'i ltungakhyad du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhige dge slong gis lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das pa na/ rgyang grags la rgyang grags su 'du shes pas 'tshol natsari 'gyur lags spang
ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// rgyang grags la rgyang grags ma lags par 'du shesan ca'i 'gyur lags )nyes byas so// rgyang grags ma lags pa la rgyang grags su 'du shesan cir 'gyur 'akas/ nyes byas
[p]/ so rgyang grags ma lags pa la/ rgyang grags ma lakas par 'du shes na tsare 'gyur lags )nyes byas so/// sdem la pho nya yi ge lag brda dang// gzhan
la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang// son pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang// tshor ba 'on pa glen pago btsun pa re zhig dge slong gas lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das par pho nyalas
bsgyur na ci 'gyur logs )nyes byas so// de bzhin du yi ge dang/ lag brda dang/ gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang )brgyud pa dang/ smon pa dang/ sems 'khrug pa dang tshor bas nyam thag pa dang/
glen pa dang )'on pa la dpag tshad gsum las 'das par lug bal bskur na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// ji ltar dge slong gis lug bal dpag tshad gsum las 'das par khyer na spang

ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa la yang phreng ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong ma dang/ dag slob ma dang dge tshul dang/ dge tshul ma dang/ sngar ltung ba byungab la sokas pa la
ni nyes byas so// sdom la pho nya yi ge lag brda dang// gzhan lasnyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang// skyon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang// tshor ba 'on pa sgren pa'o/ khyim pa la sog
pa ste[}]bslab pa byan pa h+pha ma'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das laM tsho dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang/ dge slongamanyedu/
ma yin pa la/ lug bal 'khrur 'jug gam/ 'tshod du 'jug gam rmal du 'jugan spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa// btsun pa re zhag dge slong gis pho nya las//
dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur stsol na tsa'i 'gyur lags nyes byas so// de bzhin du yi ge dang lag brda dang gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang/ brgyud pas dge slong ma nyi
du ma lags pa la lug bal 'a khrur stsolan nu'i 'gyu ba lags)nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gas/ dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa sbyin mal lug bal 'khrur stsol ni cir 'gyur 'gas/
nyes byas so// de bzhan du dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa sems g.yengs pa dang )tshor bas nyam thag pa dang/ glen ma dang/ 'on ma la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cari 'gyur lags/ nyes byas
so// btsun nga re zhig dge slong gis khyim mamo nyi dum legs pa la lug bal 'khrur stsolan cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// de nga zhin du dge slong khes len pa dang/ ma ning dang/ dge slong
ma sun phyung ba dang/ ma'agums pa dang/ pha 'gums pa dang dgra bcom pa 'gums pa dang/ mu stegs can dang/ mu stegs can zhugs pa dang/ rku thubs su gnas pa dang/ gnas
par mi bya ba dang/ dang po mim thun pa can la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags )nyes byas so// btsun par zhag dge slong gis dge slongam dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang/ tha dad du gnas pa dang/ bslab pa stsal ba la lug bal 'khrur rtsol na tsari 'gyur lags/ sprang po'i ltung byed du 'gyur
tshe ro// btsun pa re zhig bslab pa stsal bas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur 'gas/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// sngom la bsgyob bya shas tsam/
bkrus pa dang// dge 'dun gyi dang mtshan gnyis dang/ mi rung ba dang spangs pa dang// de bzhin du ni gnyen nyid dang// bzhi tshan dag tu byas pa dang// dge slong mni tha ma yin// btsun pa
re zhag dge slong ma nye du ma lags nga la/ lug pal bsgrub par bgyi ba zhagi 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug yul la mkhas pa zhig
'khrur stsol na tsa'i 'gyur lags) nyes byas so// baitsun pa re zhagi dug slong gis dge 'dun gyi lug bal 'khrur stsalan cir 'gyur lags gal rtagang sdug gar yongs bu spyang pas yongs su spyad de
drim can du byas pa zhig na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// 'on te gnasamal gyi dngos pa zhagi 'khrur bcug nani ltung ba med do// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gsi dge slong ma nya du ma 2 gis ngad la lug ba
'khrur stsol ba las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar redan mi 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas dge slong nya du ma lags pa la/ lug bal 'khrur stsol ba las mtshan gyur te/
dge slong du red na tsar 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 3 dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa 'a lug bal 'khrur 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'a gyur/
ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags nga )btsun pa dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/ lug bal 'khrur stsal kyang spang ba'i ltung byed dumi 'gyur ba lta mas lags sam/ nyi bar 'khor lod de
mi rung ba dang// 'dres pa 'khrur 'jug pa ste/mi rung ba rdza bal dang/ ba glang gi smra dang/ ri dgas kyi bal dang/ ra bal dang )'dres po zhig 'khrur bcugan nyes byas su 'gyur// btsun par zhag dag
slong gis slang ba'i lug bal 'khrur stsalan cing 'gyur lags gal te ma spangs pa zhagi yanin/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur go/ 'on te spangs pa zhig yin na ni nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge
slong gseg zhan gyi lug bal zhige 'khrur stsolan cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhage bsnyan par ma rdzogs par lug bal 'khrur rtsol ba'i sbyor ba bgyisal/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par
lags par bgyis na nu'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyis na mi 'gyur lags zhes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs
bar sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyan par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na tsami 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyison pa'i 'gyur
lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas 'gas par bgyis na cing 'gyur lags nyes byas so/ sman pa ra na pa sa sbyor pa
bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bcus na cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyisaM la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na tsar
'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la)nyo du ma lags par 'du shes pas lug bal 'khrur stsolan cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur go//
du ma lags pa la nye du dur 'du shes na mi 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// nya ru la nye du ma lags par 'du shes na chu'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// nye du la nyi dung 'du shes na cir 'gyur 'gas//
ltung pa med do// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs dal/ bstan par rdzogs par 'du shes pas lug bal de 'khrur stsol na par 'gyur lags/ sdong ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
dge slong ma bsnyan par rdzogs pa la// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cing 'gyur lags/
nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na bu'i 'gyur lags nyes byas so// dge slong gsenye du ma lags pa dge slob ma dang dge tshul dang )khyomi pa mo dang/
gzhan mu stegs can rung dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ spyod pa pa dang kun tu rgyu rnams dang )'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la 'khrur stsal na tsar 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// dge slongams

dge slong dang/ dge tshul dang 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stags canadang/ dge sbyong dang )bram ze dang spyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyu rnams dang 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams la 'khrur stsal na care
gyur lags/nyes byas so// khyim pa dang/ bum pa mo la 'khrur stsalan ca'i 'gyur lags)nyes byas so// dge slobam dang/ dge tshu'i dang dge tshul ma dang [']star ltang ba byang ba la sogs pa la nyes
byas te/ de bzhin du 'tshod pa dang rmad pa la yang brjod par bya'o/// sdom la pho nya yige lag brda dang// gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang// smyon pa dang ni sams 'khrugs dung
tshor ba 'on pa 'gro ba'o/// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyisi/ yang dge slong gang rang gi lag gis gsar
dang dngul len nam len du 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/) btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gis pho nya las gsar dang dngul lan du stsal nA cir 'gyur lags nyes byas
so// dbazhin du leg dang lag brda dang gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang brgyud pas gsar dang dngul len du stsalan mi 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gsi smyon pa gser dang
@#/ dngul len du stsal na cir 'gyur lags )nyes byas so// de bzhan du sems 'khrugs pa dang/ tshor bas nyam thag pa dang/ glen pa dang/ 'on pa dang 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa
yi gser dang dngul len du stsalan cir 'gyur lags) nyes byas so////sdom la: lkog dang mtshan dang ma sha dang/ bzhi tshan bdun tshan dben pa dang// khyim pa la sogs lus dang skad/ lan dang
sgyu gzhan gyi dge slongam/ btsun pa dge slong gsi gser dngul blangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nyi bar 'khor yod pa lkog gi phyogs nas len du 'jug pa ma

lo byad gzhan du 'du shes na'o// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gsar dang dngul len pa lasamtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong
mgaser dang dngul lan pa las mtshon pa gyur te/ dge slongadu 'dan nur 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gser gyi misha 'am/ dngul gyi masha len nam/ lan du
stsol na ca'i 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// gal te 'khor ba'i ma sha 'am/ zas kyim ga len namalen du stsal na nu'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gis
gser dang dngul la )gser dang dngul du 'du shes te blangs na mi 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur// gser dang dngul la gsar dang dngul ma lags par 'du shes na tsa'i 'gyur 'gas/ ltung ba
med do// gser dang dngul ma lags pa lagaser dang dngul 'a gas par 'du shes na mi 'gyur lags// nyes byas so// gser dang dngul ma lags pa la gser dang dadul ma 'a gas par 'du shesan cu'i
'gyur lags/ltung ba med do// btsun par zhagi bsnyan par ma rdzogs par gsar dang dadul lan ba'i sbyor ba bgyis la/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par blangs na tsa'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bstan par ma
rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar blangs na rtsa'i 'gyur lags sa byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags )nyis
byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyan par rdzogs kAr blangs na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs gar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangasan ci
'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas blangs na tsar 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba brgya la/ bstan/
par rdzogs par blangs na ci 'gyur lags/ zhes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gas dben pa la dben par 'du shes pas/ gser dngul blang bar bskon par 'gyur lags )nyes byas so// dban
pa la mi dben par 'du shes na tsar 'gyur lags )nyis dus so/ mi dben ba la dban par 'du shes na rtsar gyur lags/ nyes byas so// midaben pa la mi dben par 'du shesan pa'i 'gyur lags/
spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa'i zhage dge slong gis gser dang dngul mngon sum ru bum pa len ru stsal na tsare 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de bzhin
yi za ma dang/ mnang dang dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang/ ma 'gums pa dang pha 'gums pa dang/ dgra bcom pa 'khums pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi dben bgyis pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan semasakyis/

khrub kyin pa 'am/mu stegs can dang mu stegs can zhugs pa dang/ rku thabs su gnas pa dang/ tha dadadu gnas pa dang/ gnas par mi bgyis pa dang/ khas len pa dang/ dang po mi mthun pa can dang/ sngar ltung ba

byung ba dang/ bslab pa stsal ba gser dang dngul mngon sum du len du stsal na tsa'i 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa razhage dge slong gis lus kyi rnam par ragi byed kyis gser dang

dngul 'an du stsalan pa'i 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhagi dbus pa'i dge slong gis mtha' 'khobai kyi skad du dbus da lta gser dang dadul 'an du stsal la/ dbus pas kyang mtha' 'khob kyi skad de
ma 'tshalan tsari 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// mtha' 'khob pas dbus pa'i skad du mtha' 'khob ba la gsar dang dngul lan du stsal la )mtha' 'khob pas kyang dbus pa'i skad dem 'tshalan tsar 'gyur
lags/ nyes byas so// mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob ba'i skad du dbus pa lagaser dang dngul len du stsalal/ dbus pas kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad de ma 'tshal na tsar 'gyur lakas[）]nyis byas so//
zab0 dbus pas dbus pa'i skad du mtha' 'khob pa la gser dang dngul len du stsalal/ mtha' 'khob ngas kyang dbus pa'i skad de ma 'tshal na rtsar 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa dge slong gis rang gi
lag gas gser dang da dul lenanam/ len du stsal kyang ltang byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mas lags sam) par 'khor yod de/'di ltar gser dang dngul len pa na rang gang byed pa'i sems mi bskyod cing mi

rung ba'i dngos po las )rung ba'i dngos po gzhan zhig rang gir bya'o zhes tshig tu smana'o// btsun pa re theg dge slong gsi gzhan gyi slad du gser dang dngul len nam lan du stsalan car 'gyur lags/ ltung byed
da/ btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas gser dang dngul len nam len du stsalan cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig bslabs pa stsal bas rang gi lagi gas gser dang
dngul len nam/ len du stsalan cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhage dge slong mas rang gisagaser dang dngul len nam/ len du stsalan cing 'gyur lags )nyes byas so//
dge tshul dang dge tshul ma la ni ltung ba med do// sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so// sdom la/ pho nya yig lag brda dang// gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang// smon
ba dang ni sems 'khrugs dang/ tshor ba 'on po 'gro ba 'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la) tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang
mngon mtshon can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na spang ba'i ltung byed ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gis pho nya las mngon mtshan can gyis spyod
yi pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgyadan cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas ste/ de bzhin du yi ga dang/ lag brda dang/ gzhan gyi slad du dang gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang/ brgyud pa la yang brjod par bya'o
btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis smon pa dang lhan cig mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyidan par 'gyur lags nyes byas so// de bzhin du sems 'khrugasapa dang )tshor bas nyam thag
pa pa dang/ 'on pa dang/ glen pa dang/ 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgyad na ca'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so//
mtshan dang bzhi tshan kho na dang// bdun tshan dang nigazhan phyir dang/ bslab dang nye du 'dra ba dang// dge slong mo ni tha ma yin// btsun pa re zhag dge slong mngon mtshan can gyis spyod nga/

rnam pa sna tshogs brgyadapa las mtshanagyur te) dge slong mar red nas rud pa sgrub na cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slongam mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam/
pa sna tshogs bgyid pa las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red nas rnyed pa grub na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gsemi la mar 'du shes pas )mngon
0mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na tsari 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes na 4ra 'gyur lags 3 nyes byas so/mi ma lags pa la/
ma'i 'du shes na tsari 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ mi ma gas pa la mi ma lags par 'du shes na chu'i 'gyur lags// nyes byas so// btsun pa de 'ge bsnyen par ma rdzogs par mngon mtshan can
kyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa lags par bgyis na cu'i 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bstan par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bkyis la )bsAn par rdzogs
kar lags par bgyis na rung 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs par lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lakas nyes byas so//
bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bkyis la/ bsnyan par rdzolas kar lags par bgyis na nur 'gyur lags nyes byas so// nga na par lcogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la bsnyen par rdzogs
nas lags par bgyis na dur 'gyur lags )nyis byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen paro gsanas lags par bkis na tsa'i 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur//
bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor babagyis la bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa ra lags par bgyisan tsang 'gyur lags )nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhigadage slong gis gzhan gyi slad du mngon maMtshan can gyis spyod
pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgyad na cir 'gyur lags 3 nyes byas so// btsun pa re b+hag bslab pa stsal ba mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na rtsa'i 'gyur lag

spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur// btsun pa nye du dang lhan cacig mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid na tsa'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis mngon mtshan can

gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nyis bar 'bor yod de )'dra bas 'dra ba brjes na ltung ba med do// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong ma mngon mtshan can

gyis spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgyaden ca'i 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro/dge slob ma dang/ dge tshul dang dag tshul ma dang 2 sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so//

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang nyo tshong rnam pa sna tshogs byed naM/ spong ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// zhes gsung
pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste gzhung lhag ma ni mngon mtshan can gyis spyod pa la bshad pa ji lta ba de bzhin du nyo tshang 'di la yang rgyas bar brjod par bya'o// sdom la: de ni nyamA
dang bu la gzhan dang// mu stags so btang mni dkar dang// smyon pa mtshan dang pho nya dang// yod dang 'tsho ba dge slong ma/// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasal tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor/
gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'a dngas kyis 3 dag srung gis lhung pasrid lha sa// pa cu'i bar du bcang bar bya'o// de las 'das par 'chang na ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa//
btsun pa lhung bzed de nyid bcangs na ltang bar yang 'gyur la )de nyidi btungs na ltar bar mi 'gyur ba lta mas lags sam// nyi bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong lhung bzed chen po 'chang pa las/
mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar rad nasabacangs na nyes byas su 'gyur/ dpatsun dar zhing dge slong gas spang ba'i lhung bzad nyams na/ ltung ba bshags par bgyi lags sam/ nyi bar 'khor bshags
par bya'o// ltung ba bshags nas slar na srang bar bgyi 'am nya par 'khor ma yin no/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 3 dge slong gsi lhung bzed lhag pa zhag bcu'i bar du bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs
pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis lhung bzed lhag pa dgung bcu'i bar bas thal bar bcangs 'a/ 'di las ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nyi bar 'khor yod de/'di ltar dge slob
gas yul gzhan nas dge slong zhage la/ dge slong gi lag tu lhung bzed cagi bsaran/ nges lhung bzed de yun shan tu ring por bcings kyang ltung ba med de/ btsun pa re zhig dge slong gas mu stegs can
gyi snod bcangs na tsari 'gyur lags )nyes byas so// btsun pa ri zhage dge slong gis lhung byed som gtang ba lhag pa bcangasan tsare 'gyur lags 'as byas so// btsun pa re zhake dge slong gis lhang
[©]// bad skya bo zhagi bcangasan ca'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa dge slong gsi lhung bzed rnyed ma thag tu sems 'khrugs bar 'gyuran/ gang nas bzung rgyu dgung bcur
yi bgrang bar bgyi/ gang nas rang gi sems sor chud pa nas so// btsun pa dge slong gis lhung bzed lhag pa dgung bcu las 'das par bcangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags

glu/ sam nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'diltar dge slong gsi ltung bzed u0f74da nas zhag bcu lon pa dang/ mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red nas 'chang na'o// btsun pa dge slong mas lcang bzed lhag pa dkyang gcig

lhag par bcangs kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba ltamachis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong mas lhung bzed rnyed ma thud tu mtshan 'gyur te/ dge slong du ra danas 'a chung nu'o// btsun pa
wA dge slong gso lun ni tu ri mo 'gi tu lhung bzed lhag par bcangs la/ de la ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nyabar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong gsi dge slong zhagi la lcabazed
kyi bya'i dge slong mngags na/ des khyung bzod de blangs te lus mi tu ri mo 'gi tu'adungasakyang ltung ba medado/ btsun pa dge slong la lhung bzed gcig gi bdag cing mchis la/ de nyid kyang sngar bar
'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nyi ngar 'khor yod de/ byin gyisam brlabs par bcangs na'o// btsun pa dge slong gis namatsho'i bar du lhung bzed lhag pa bcangs kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta
mas lags bam nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong zhag bcu tshun tshad dus las 'dasana'o// btsun pa re zhagi bslab pa stsal pa lhung bzer lhagapa dang bcu las 'das pa 'chang na tsare ba ba
lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// ge slong mni lhung bzer lhag pa zhag gcig las 'das par 'chang na spang pa ni ltung byed du 'gyur ro/ dag slob ma dang dge tshul dang 3 dug tshul ma naM
ba med do// sngar ltung pa byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas so// sdom labo nya ye gi lag brda dang/ gzhan la snyad 'dogs brgyud pa dang/ sbyin pa dngani sams 'khrugs dang
tshor lu 'on pa 'gro ba 'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan ras kyis ste nga dge slong dang lhung 'then lhan sna
med pa spyad bzod pa yod bzhin du bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir/ lhung bzed sar pa gzhan tshol zhing/ ltung ba byed grub nas spang ba'i ltung byed de/ dge slong res lhung bzed de dge slong gi 'or na

dbul bar bya zhing/ dge slong gis khor de'i lhung bzed tha mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dge slong de la phyis/ dge slong khyed kyis lhung bzed 'di byin gyis brlab par mi bya/ gtong bar mi bu gzhan la spyinang/

mi bu bar chaka ra 'i mthar thug gi bar du khad kyis dal du dal bus spyad par bya'o zhes sbyin par bya ste/ da la de ni cho ga yin no zhes gsatsungs pa gang lags pa btsun pa ra zhagi dge slong gis pho lha yas phyungabasring
[©]// gnyis pa stsalan ca'i 'gyur lags)sa byas so// lhung bzed thob cing 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'apho nya las ji ltar yige dang/ lag brda dang/ gzhan la snyad
'dogs pa dang brgyud pas lhung bzed gnyis pa btsalon car gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ lhung bzed thobanatsari 'gyur lags )nyis byas kho na'o// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gis smyon pa las lhung/
bzed gas patshol na nu'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so/ lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor bas nyam thag pa dang/ glen pa dang/ 'on
ba dang/ 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams las lhung bzed gsi pa tsho'an tsari 'gyur lags nyes byas so// lhung bzed thob na nu'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o sdom la
b+he mu stegs can dang zam nyid// de bzhin nyid du mtshan dang yang// thun mongadang niba'i tshananyid// yo byad rnams dang dge slong/ btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gsi 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan/
mu stegs can dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ spyod pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyu rnams las lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// lhung bzed thoban tsa'i 'gyur lags/
nyes byas kho na'o/ khatsun pa'i zhagi dge slong gsam stags can gyi snod bslangasan cani 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// snod thob na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas kho na'o//
'dul ba gzhung bla ma/// bam po bdun pa// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gis dri ma las lhung bzed gnyis pa btsal na ca'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// lcang
bzod thob na ci'i 'gyur la gas/ nyes byas kho na'o// de bzhin du ma mang dang/ ma ning mo dang tshun gnyis pa las lung ga pa nga gnyis/ pa tshol rir 'gar lags/ nyes byas so// lhung bzed thob na
cu'i 'gyur 'gas/ nyes byas kho na'o// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gci lhung bzed sbyang 'brong pa mchas bzhin du ltung bzed gnyis [… ]slangs pa las mtshan gyur de dge slong mar rer nas shes
na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong mas lcang 'byed sad bzed pa 8tshes zhanicu/ lhung pa dang sa pa btsal ma 'a/sa mtshan gyur te/ dge slong
du red nas thoban tsa'i 'gyur 'gas/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhag dog slong gisaMlhung bzed kyang brlod pa mchas bzhin du) 'chi bdag gam khyim bdag gi mchis brang las
lhung bzed gas pa btsal ba las de gnyis kamtshan gyur to )mtshan gyur nas thong na tsa'i 'gyur lags/ drang ba'i ltung byed ru 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhig dge slong mas lhung bzed srang brjod
pa mchis bzhin tu/ khyim bdag gam khyami bdag gi mas brang nya du ma lags pa las/ lhung bzed gnyis pa btsal ba las deg si ka'i mtshan gyur te/ mtshan gyur nas thogaM na mi 'gyur lag/
[p]// spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ga/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la )bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na tsani 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs bar/
'i bslangasal) bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na tsare 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslas la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na tsa'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen
ts+tsa bar ma rdzogs bar bslangs la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na ru'i 'gyur lags)nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs kar bslangs la// ) bsnyen par rdzogs kar gruban pa'i 'gyur lags/
nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogasakar bslangs la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas gruban cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs nas bslangs la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas gruban ri
gyur khag spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuyokhasnyen par rdzogazhas bslas bsnyon par m rdzogs par grub na 'di 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gnyis kyis lhung bzed gcig bsrungs na
dzi 'gyur lags nyes byas so// lhung bzed thob na tsa'i 'gyur 'gas/ nyesajus 'onago/ btsun pa re zhage dge slong gis mi la ma'i 'du shes pas/ ltung bzed gnyis pa bslangasan ci
'gyur lags/ zhes byas so// ltung ba zid thob na ci 'gyur lags) spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// mi la mi ma lags par 'du shes na tsa'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// lhung bzed thob
[4]ca'i 'gyur la gas/ nyes byas kho go/ mi ma lags pa la ma'i 'du shes na tsari 'gyur lags/ zhes byas so// lhung bzed gong na ri bgyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o/ mi ma lags pa lami ma
la gas bar 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags )[–]sa byas kho na'o// btsun pa re zhig dge slong gsige slong gi yo byad dag gam ni gus lhang
bzed gnyis pa tsho na rtsi 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa re zhig bslang pa stsal bas/ lhung bzed kyang bzod pa mngasabazhanedu) lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na ci'i 'gyur lags/ nyes
byas so// lhung bzed thoban cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re zhag dge slong mas )lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mas bani du/ lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na nu'i 'gyur
lags)nyes byas so// lcangabazed thob na tsari 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slob ma dang dge tshul dang/ dge tshul ma rnams kyis/ lhung bzed par bzod pa mchis bzhin
ru: lhung bzed gnyis pa btsal na nu'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// lhung bzed thoban tsa'i 'gyur lags 3 nyes byas kho na'o// sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la nyes byas su 'gyur te/
snga ma bzhanin// sdom laM pho nya li gi lag brda dang// gzhan la snyad 'dogs po rgyud pa dang/ smyon pa dang ni semasagalangasaM dang// tshor ba 'on pa 'gro ba'o
[55 ]@#/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a das la// tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyisi/ lang dge slong gang rang gis bslangs pa'i dog bas//

phrag la nye du ma yin pa la chos gos 'thag tu 'jugan chos gos krub na sngang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa// btsun pa re zhagi dge slong gse pho nya las tha ga pa nye du ma lags
ba latshos gos 'thag tu stsal nas/ chos gos sgrub na mi 'gyur lags/ nyis byas go/ de bzhin du yi ge dang/ lag brda dang/ gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang/ brgyud pa dang/
hU~M gzhan gyi slad du thag pa nye ru ma lags pa la/ chos gos 'thag tu stsal na tsa'i 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa de zhage dag song gse tha ga pa sbyin pa la chos gos 'thag tu tsal nas
