tuso nas skya rengs shar ba de yang zla ba gsum du gnas pas brtan pa btang na de'i brtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o// u pa li zla ba gsum duganas nas brtan pa zhes bya sta/ de la yang zla ba
gsum dumangon no// yi dam las 'gal bas nyes byas su 'gyur ro// btsun pa dbyar phyi mar tshul duzhugs pa zhig brtan pa btingan btangeb zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li khacig ni brtan pa
bting ba zhes bya'o// kha cig ni mabating ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa gang ga le brtan pa bting ba zhes brgya/ u nga la gang dbyar snga maratshul duzhugs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun brtan pa 'ding
ba'i dge slong dang/ dbyar phyi mar tshul du zhugs pa de dag lhan cig tu brtan pa bting nade'i brtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o// u pa la zla ba gsum duganas nas brtan pa zhesakhya ste/ doni khrub
@#/ gsum du shes pa'ang mngado// u pa li dge 'dun thams cad dabyar phyimar tshul du zhugs la/ zla ba gsum du gnas nas brtan pa btingan de dag gi brtan ba bting ba zhes bya
du ba li zla ba gsum du gnas nas brtan pa zhes bya ste/ de dag ni glu bgagumadumangon no// btsun pa dbyar gzhan du gnas pa zhig gis brtan pa btang na brtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/
u pa la kha cig ni brtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o// kha cig nim bting ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa gang gi brtan pa btang ba zhes bgyi/ gang gi brtan ba ma ting ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li
dge slong dag mtshams so sor bcad pa'i gnasan dbyar gnas gzhan du gnas la/ gzhan du song sa brtan po btingan de'i brtan pa ma bting ba zhe bya'o// u pa li brtan pa gang zhen/
zla ba gsum gnas nas brtan pa bting ba lanazla ba gsum dushes pa yang mad ngo// u pa li gang la zla ba gsum duganas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'duna rnams dbyar zlob gsum 'dus pa dang/ de nyid
kyi nya khri zhag gcig lamatshams chen po bkrol te/ gnas bzhi 'am lnga'i mtshams gcig tu byas nas brtan pa btingan/ gnas de dag thams cad du brtan pa btung ba zhes bya'o// de
bzhin du gnas la gnas gzhan du brtanapa bting ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa sangs pas brtan pa bting nabartan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'om/ u pa la kha cig ni bting ba zhes bya'o// kha cig
[s/ ]mi bting ba zhes bya'o// btsun ba gang gi brtan ba ma bting ba zhes ba kyi/ u pa li dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong gang la dag 'dun 'dus pa rnams kyis spangs ba'i las byas pa de dag kyang
bzod par ma gsol bar/ dbyar gnas pa dag kyang lhan cig brtan pa bting na de'i brtan pa ni ma bting ba zhes bya'o// gang gi bting ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li dge slong gang dbyar tshul du zhugs
pa la dge 'dun 'dus pa rnams kyis mnyam du mi spyod pa'i sdom pa bcas par gyur tam/ bkar ba'i las byas par gyur la/ des kyang bzod pa gsolan/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun rnams
dang lhan cig tu brtan pa btingan de'i brtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong brtan pa 'ding bas brtan pa blangs nas bkru bdang/ brkyang ba dang/ dra bdang/
btsas pa thams cad dang/ khab so kama'i b.rangashog mar 'aglo bar byos la/ bdag gis chos gos 'dres dge 'dun gyi brtan pa gdabye bar bya ba gdong ngo// bdag gis bting ngo zhes sams
rnam pa gsum skyedacig/ sems rnam pa gsum bskyod kyang chos gos 'dis dge 'dun kyi brtan par gding bar bya/ bdag gis bting ngo zhes sems rnam pa gnyis bskyod na brtan pa bting
ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa sems bskyed pa gcig gis brtan pa gdeng du rung ngam/ u pa li rung ste// 'di ltang yang brtan pa gding ba'i dge slong gis brtan pa gding bar bdag ming 'di/
zhes bgyi bas gog 'dis dge 'dun gyi brtan par gding ngo zhes sems bskyed na brtan pa gding ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa tshul nas 'byung ba'i tsha rgyal pos shol bo 'a nas
dge slong de dag gis brtan pa ji ltar gding bar khagyi/ ji ltar tshul nas byung babazhinano// btsun pa brtan pa de nyid rungal de nyid mi rung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam pa la yod de// 'di ltar yang

dge slong de dag kha cig shos bor/ kha cig shol ma bor bar tshul du zhugs te de nyid du khyim bdag gis shol ma bor ba'i gnas su tshul nas 'byung ba de nyid kyi 'bri zhag gcig la dge 'dunaganyis kazan/

byinate/ brtan pa'i gos yulan gos de shol ma bor ba la ni rung ngo// shol bor ba lani mi rung ngo// btsun pa gangam lta bu'itshig brgyad po 'di dag gisan brtan pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de thunamong/
bzhedu/ mom las pa ni du/ u pa 'di thog ma dang tham ma gtogs par lhagam rnams ni thun mong ba'o// btsun pa brtan pa 'ding ba'i dge slong gis brtan pa 'ding ba'i tshamtshan gyuran brtan pa bting

cha bzhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li bting ba zhes bya ste/ brtan pa zad pa'i dge slongadad par byos shig/ btsunapa brtan pa zhes kyang bgyi/ brtan pa 'ding ba zhes kyang bgyi/ brtan pa byin pa zhes kyang brgyan
btsun pa brtan pan gang/ brtan pa 'ding bani gang/ brtan pa 'byin pa ni gang lags/ u pa li gos ni brtan pa'o// sems bskyed pani brtan pa bting ba'o// ma lta bu'i tshig brgyad po ni brtan pa/

'byin pa'o/ btsun pa dge slong rnams kyis gnas bzhi 'am lngamatshams kyi nang du bgyis nas dbyaratshul du zhugs te/ de dag tshul nas byung ste/ brtan pa bting na gnas de dag thams cad dubartan pa bting
ba zhes bgyi 'ag/ u pa 'aTams cad du brtan pa bting ba zhes pa'o/ btsun pa de ste brtan pa bting nas mtshams chen po bkrol te so sor mtshams bkun brtan pa byung ba zhes ba 'am//
u pa li ma yin no// gnas de dag thams cad du brtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa la brtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o// de ste so so mtshams bcanganas brtan pa phyung na gnas de dag thams cad
du brtan pa phyung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lam yin te/ gang dag gi 'byin pa de dag ni brtan ba phyung ba zhes bya'o// gang mi 'byin pa de dag ni brtan pam phyung ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa tshul
nas byung ba dang/ dge slong rnams kyis gnas bzhi'am lngamatshams gcig tu byas nas bstan pa bting na/ gnas de dag thams cad du brtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li thams cad du brtan
pa bting ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa de ste brtan pa bting nas mtshams chen po bkrol te so sor mtshams bkum na brtan pa bting nga zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lam yin te/ de dag thams cad du brtan pa/
bting ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa de so sor mtshams bkum nas brtan pa byung na gnas de dag thams cad dubartanapa phyungab zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lim yinate/ gang 'byin pa de dag ni brtan pa phyung bzhes
dngajings chanarkyen// 'byin pa gnyis dang dbye ba gnyis// tshad gnyis pa yang de bzhin te// khyim pa dag lasogs pa dag/ bslab pa byin pa thama'o// btsun pa ji srid
wA cig tu brtson pa gding bar bskye/ u pa li zla ba gsum ste/ ji ltar zla ba gsum du gnas bar tshul du zhugs pa'o// btsun pa ji srid cig tu brtan pa bcang bar bgyi zla ba snga'o/ btsun pa gang

dbyar phyi ma'imathar brtan pa bting na de dag kyang zla ba lngar brtan pa bting bar 'gyur lam/ u pa ligang gis brtan pa ji ltar bting bar gyur pa de dag gi grangs bzhin zla ba ltar bcang bar bya'o// btsun pa gso
sbyin gyi mthar brtan pa ga ding bar bgyi 'am/ u pa li gso sbyin gyi mthar bya'o// btsun pa brtan pa gso sbyin gyi mthar dbyung bar bgyi 'am/ u pa li gso sbyin gyi mthar bya'o// btsun pa sbyar mang
bar bzhag pa la rgyu du/ rkyenadu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyalnga dang rkyen lnga sta/ lnga pode gang zhen dge slong dang bcas/ sgo leb dang bcas pa'i gnas su gyur ba dang/
'jigs pa dang bcas/ dogs pa dang bcas pa'i yul dang/ char 'bab pa 'am/ char pa 'bab par dogs par gyur pa dang/ dus ma yin par grong gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod nga ra gyud pa dang/
gnas gzhan du brtan pa bting bar gyur pa dang/ gsol ba dang lasan tha ma'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi gos ras chen rung bar bzhag pa la rgyudu/ rkyen du/ su ba la gsum ste/ rAr pa mi
'ang ba cing char ba 'bab par mi dogs par gyur pa dang/ dus ma yin par grong gzhananam/ grong khyer gzhan nam/ klung rgal bar 'dod par gyur pa dang/ klung gi drung ngam/
khron pa'i drung na mi gnas pa'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi gos ras chen ji srid du bcang bar bgyi/ zla ba phyed dang lnga'o// btsun pa brtan pa 'ding ba'i gnas su rkyen mang par 'gyur ba du/ u pa li bcu
sta zhag gcig gis 'bral ba med pa dang/ zhag bcu las 'da' ba med pa dang/ zla bgacig las 'da' bamed pa dang gosam bsngos pa rnams bcang ba dang/ chos gos stod g.yogs

dngamathang gos gnyis pus ljongs sbyod du 'gro ba dang/ mang po bra ba mad/ yang yang za ba mad/ stanamadrangs par 'gro ba dang/ gos rnams kyi bder tshol ba dang/ ston zla tha chung nas dpyid zla ra ba'i
bar du sku/ gang gis redapa klob bde dag ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o// btsun pa jibaslab pa'i gnasasam/ chos gos byin gyis brlab pa de dag ma mchis par 'gyur ram/ u pa
le ma yin te/ 'di dgan yon tan no// btsun pa gsol pa dang las pas sngar brtan pa dbyung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ 'di ltar yang dge slong gzhi ba de dag gis de nyid kyis 'khri
[， ]]zhag gcig la brtan pa bting bar gyur pa dang/ dge slong glo bur du mang zhig lhags nas/ de dag ni de'i nyin mo bco lngar gyur te/ gso sbyin byed so sor thar pa klog pa

dang de sta dge slong gzhi ba rnams kyang de dag gi rjes su zhugs nas gso sbyin byas nagasol ba dang las ma byas par brtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa dge slong gzhi ba rnams kyis brtan po bting
stamatshams kyi slad rol tu mchis pa dang/ glo khug dudage slong rnams lhags te/ brtan pa phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li gang gis bstan pa bting
ba de nyid kyis brtan pa phyung ngo// btsun pa dbyag tshul du zhugs pa las dge 'dun byon gang gis brtan pa gding/ chos bzhin du smra ba rnams kyis so/ btsun pa brtan po bting ba'i gnas bye na dge
'dun byenadabyar gyi red paM sus 'thob/ phyogs gnyis kas so// btsunupa destamangon du gyur pa las red na sus 'thob/ chos kyi phyogs kyis so// btsun pa tshad las chung ba'i chos gos
dum bur gyur te gos su btsems shing brtan par btingan brtan par bting ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lim bting ba'o// btsun pa tshad las chung ba zhig brtan pa patingan brtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/
u pa lim bting ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa gos ji lta bu s brtan pa gding bar bgyi/ u pa linur lnga zheng du gsum pas so// btsunapa brtan pa gding ba khyim pa zhig gis brtan pa btingan
brtan pa bting ba zhes pa kyi 'am/ u pa lim bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// de bzhin du brtan pa 'ding ba mning dang/ ma gnas pa dang/ so sor gnas
panas/ sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag gis brtan pa btingan brtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi lam/ u pa li ma bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa
brtan pa 'ding ba za ma zhig gis brtan ba bting na bting ba zhes bgyi lam/ u pa li ma bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa brtan pa 'ding ba dge 'dun
gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang/ rtsobar phyogs pa dang/ bslab pa stsal ba rnams kyis brtan pa bting na bting ba zhes bgyi 'am u pa li bting ba zhes bya ste// dge 'dunani 'das pa dang
bcas pa'o// btsun pa brtan pa 'ding ba smyon pa zhig gis brtan pa btingan brtan pa bting bzhes bgyi 'am/ ma bting ba zhes bya'o// de sta dge slong gi 'du shes yodal/ bdag ming 'di
zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi brtan pa gding ngo// bdag gis bting ngo zhesasems bskyod na brtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang/ nad kyis gzir ba rnams su shes
par bya'o// btsun pa brtan pa 'ding ba glen pa dang/ lhug pa dang/ 'on pa rnams kyis brtan pa bting nabating pa zhes bgyi 'am/ ub li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun 'das ba
dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa brtan pa 'ding ba gzhan du gnas pas brtan pa bting na bting bzhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang//
bcas pa'o// brtan pa'i dngos po rdzogs so/// bam po bcudagu pa// mdor na: gang du gang gis mtshams bzhi dang// bsgo ba gos
wAdang gso sbyin bzhi// brtan bzhi bya ba gang zag go/ btsun pa yul ko'u sham ba'i dge 'dun gang gi tshe bya bar gyur/ namamatshams kyi nang na gcig pu gnas pa las gso sbyin byed pa dang/
dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang/ dge 'dun don rnams tha dad par byas pana'o// btsun pa yul ko'u shamabir dang po dge 'dun gang gis phye/ chos ma yin par smras pas/ de dag gis thog mar
mtshams kyi nang du gso sbyin dang/ dge 'dun kyi bya ba dang/ dge 'dun gyi don rnams tha dad par byas pas so// btsun pa yul ko'u sham bi bas mtshams bshika na mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi
kham u pa lim yin no// btsun pa de sta yul yangs pa canan gnas bsamatshams bshigan mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi 'ag/ u pa li ma yin no// btsun pa dge slong ma'i dge 'dun byo
nas phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su gzhan gyi gnasab la zla phyed spyad cing lung 'bog pa dang bstan par bgyi 'am/ btsun pa 'di skad du sring mo rnams ji mthun par gyis shig ces sgo zhig/ btsun/
padage slong ma'i dge 'dun bye nas phyogs su gnas pa'i dge slong dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing lung 'bogacing bstan pa btsal bar bgyi 'am/ btsal bar bya'o// su las btsal/ chos la
phyogs pa las so/ btsun pa dge slong gi dge 'dun byanas phyogs gnyis su gnas pa dag gis dge slong ma dag la lung 'bog cing bstan pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ drag slong ma'i dge 'dun mi bya bar
bya ba'i phyir byinacika/ btsun pa yul ko'u sham bir phyogs gnyis ka 'dus shing 'khod par byed na gzu khos gang du dge slong ma la lung dbog par bgyi/ mtshams kyi phyi srol tu song ba'o// btsun pa
khul ko'u sham ber phyogs gnyis ka 'dus shing 'khod par gyur la/ dge slong gzu bo dag kyang mtshams kyi slad rol tumachis par gyur pa dang/ khyim bdag gcigamachis nas dge 'dun la gos shig phulan

gang gis 'thob/ phyogs gnyis kas so// yul ko'u sham bin gnas pa yul yangs pa na gnas pa dag dang rgyun cig tagasosbyin bgyingan gsosbyin bgyis pa zhes bgyi kham/ u pa li ma yin no// yul yangs pa na gnas/
pas yul ko'u shama'i bdag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyin bgyidan gsosbyin bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// gzu bo rnams yul ko'u sham na gnas pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyin
bgyid na gso sbyin bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lim yin no// gabru bo dag yul yangs pa canan gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gso sbyin bgyid na gso sbyin bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ upa lom
[j ]// yin no// de lta byed na gzu bo'i dngos pomed do// btsun pa brtan pa ma bting ba'i gnas su dag 'dun bye nabartan pa gang gis gding bar bgyi/ chos su smra ba/
dag gis so// btsun pa brtan pa btang ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye na baNan pa gang gis dbyung bar bgyi/ chos su smra ba rnams kyis so// btsun pa ganganye bar phyogs pa de shams/
cad so sor gnas pa lags sam/ 'bar phyogs pa gnas pa ma yin pa'ang yod/ so sor gnas la kengar phyogs pa yang yod/ rtanga' phyogs laso sor gnas pa'ang yod/
)bar yong ma phyogs la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa'ang yodado// zhu bar phyogs laso sor gnas pa ma yin pa ni gang dngos po lnga la zhibar phyogs par gyur pa ste/ ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun
gyis sangs par m gyur pa dang/ slar las ma byas pa'i phyir spangs pa rab gyung pa dang sdig pa la lta nga ma btang nga 'i phyir nga ngas par ma gyur pa'o// so sor gnas la 'baram phyogs
pani 'di ltaradage slong do mamathong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis spangs par gyur pa dang/ slar las ma byas pa'i phyir dang/ sdig par lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir sbangs par gyur pa dang//
dngos po lnga la yang nyabar phyogs par ma gyur pa'o// te bar yang phyogs lasosor yang gnas pa ni 'di ltar dge slong de dngos po lnga le bar phyogs par yang gyur la/ ma mthong ba'i phyir dge
[/ ]'dun gyis kyang spangs par grub pa dang/ slar las ma byas pa'i phyir dang/ sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par gyur pa'o// tabar phyogs pa'ang ma yinal so sor gnas/
ba'ang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de lta bu dag ma gtogs pa'o// gang 'bar phyogs pa de thams cad mi gnas pa lags sam/ 'bar phyogs pa ma gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod/ mi gnas
ladabar phyogs pa yang yod/ zhe bar yang phyogs la mi gnas pa yang yod/ 3bar yang ma phyogs la mi gnas pam yin pa yang yod do// 'bar phyogs la mi gnas pa ni 'di ltar dge slong

de dngos po lnga la bar phyogs par gyural/ phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa dag kyang byung bar ma gyur pa'o// mi gnas la nye bar yang ma phyogs pa ni de 'diltar dge slong de pas pham pa bzhi las gang yang
rung ba zhes pa byung bar gyur la/ dngos po lnga lan 'bar ma phyogs pa yin no// de bar yang phyogs la mi gnas pa yang yin pa ni/ 'di ltar dge slong de dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par gyur
cing pas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung zhes pa byung ba yin no// tabar phyogs pa yang ma yin la mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i rnam pa de lta bu ma gtogs pa'o// gang so sor
gnas pa de thams cad mi gnas pa lags sam/ so sor gnas la mi gnas pa ma yin pa'ang yod/ mi gnas la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod/ so sor yang gnas lami
gnas pa yang yod// gnas la so sor yang mi gnas pa yang yod do// so sor gnas la mi gnas pa ma yin pa ni/ 'di ltar dge slong de ma mthong ba'i phyir
spangs bar gyur cing slar las ma byas pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir sngangs par gyur la phas pham pa bzhi las nyes pa gang yang rungam byung ba yin no// mi gnas la so sor
gnas pa ma yin pani/ gang 'di ltarangage slong des pas pham pa bzhi'inyis pa gang yang rung byung bar gyur gyi/ ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis sbyang ba ma byas par gyur cing/ sur las
ma byas pa dang sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir sngas par ma gyur pa'o// mi gnas la so sor yang gnas pa ni de 'di ltar dgo slong de mamathong ba'i phyir sngangs pa yang yonal/ phas pham pa
bzhi'i tas pa gang yang rung bar gyur pa'o// mi gnas pa'angam yin la so sor gnas pa'ang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de lta bu ma gtogs pa'o// btsun pa dge slong nyid kyis dge slong gi dgo
'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong mas ma lags/ dge slob mas ma lags/ dge tshulamasam lags/ de tshul pas ma lags sam/ u pa li dge slong nyid kyis dge slong gi
dge 'dun 'khyedakyi/ dge slong mas ma yin/ dge slob masam yin/ dge tshulams ma yin/ dag tshul pas ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams ni dge 'dun bye ba'i phyir
rtsolago/ btsun pa dge slongs nying kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'khyod kyi/ dge slong gis ma lags/ dge slob mas ma lags/ dge tshul mas ma lags/ dge tshul phas ma lags/
sam/ u pa li dge slong ma nyid kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong pas ma yin/ dge slong mas ma yin/ dge tshul mas ma yin/ dge tshul pas ma yin mod kyi/
'on kyang dge slong rnams ni dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir rtsol lo// btsun pa dbyan ni gang/ kha na ma tho ba dang ldan pa ni gang lags/ dbye bani dge 'dun no// khanam tho ba dang ldan pa ni 'byed 'o//
btsun pa dge 'dun phyon cir 'gyur/ sbom po ste/ gsol ba dang las ma nyams na dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li gang gi tsho Di sA/
pa'i dge slong mas mtshams su phyin bya ba la bab par gyur/ de dag thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur/ dad pa blang pa'i rigs pa las dad pa rlangs par gyur/ btsun pa dge slong
rnams kyis kyang mtshams kyi nang yin par 'du shes te/ gso sbyin dang las tha dad du byed pa de ltar na dge 'dunabya ba zhes bya'o// dge 'dunaphye bas nongs pa gang bshags par bgyi/ nyes pa
sbom po'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i gang zag la gleng bar ma bya zhig/ dran par ma bya zhig ces gsungs na/ de lta bu'i gang zag gang lags/ gang zag gang mdo rdzogs
'dzin pa ma lta bu 'dzin pa bsod nams chen go 'khor mang po/ dag yog mang po grags pa de'o// de lta bu'i gang zag gcig sangasan cir 'gyur/ sa pa
sbom por 'gyur ro// yul ko'u sham ba'i dngos po rdzogs so/// mdor na skad dang namamakha' mtshams dngas/ chos gnyis dang ni ma 'dus pa// chod pa
'khor dang gcig cig dang// ma 'dus gang zag gnas de bzhin// btsun pa 'phags pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang/ dge slong de dag gis kyang
'thags pa'i skad ma 'tshalanalas bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa'i dge slong ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsunapa 'phags pa zhig
gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang/ dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed/
pani 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang/ dge slong de dag gis kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skadam 'tshalan las bgyis pa zhes
khagyi 'am/ u pa li las byas pa zhes bya sta/ las byed pa na 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skud du las bgyis pa dang/ dge slong de
ga gis 'phags ba'i skad ma 'tshalanalas bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pani 'das pa dang bcas nga 'o// btsun pa sa la gnas pas nam mkha' la
gnas pa'i grangs su bskangan las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li mi rung ngo// btsun pa nam mkha' la gnas pas sa la gnas pa'i grangs su bskung na las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa limi rung
ngo btsun pa las bgyid pa sa la gnas pas nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyi las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa limi rung ngo// btsun pa las bgyid pa nam mkha' gnas pas sa la gnas pa
rnams kyi las bkyir rung ngam u pa li mi rung ngo// de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa dang/ mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig bzhir bya'o// btsun pa
sa la gnas pas sa la gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig las bkyir rung ngam u pa li rung ngo// 'di ltar yang dus sa la gnas pas grangs bskang zhing sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa blangs par
sgyur pa'o// ji ltaros laganas pas sa la gnas pa dang lhan cig pa de bzhin dus la gnas pa dang rtsig pa la gnas par ro// sa la gnas pa dang shing la gnas par 'o// rtsig pa la gnas pa
dang rtsig pa la gnas par ro// rtsig pa la gnas pa dang sa la gnas par go// rtsig la gnas pa dang shing la gnas par ro// shing la gnas pa dang shing la gnas par rdo/ shing la
gnas pa dngas la gnas par// shing la gnas pa dang rtsig pa la gnas pa lhan cig tu las bgyirarung ngam/ u pa li rung ste/ ji ltar yang shing la gnas pa/
rnams kyis grangs su bskang// sa la gnas pa rnams las dang pa blangs par gyur pa'o// lasarnam pa bzhi sku/ chos bzhin ma yin par byed cingam 'dus pa dang/ chos bzhin
ma yin par 'dus pa dang/ chos bzhin du ma 'dus pa dang/ chos bzhin du 'dus pa'o// chos bzhin ma yin par ma 'dus pa gang zhen/ gsol ba byas nas las ma bsgrags te ma
'dus par yang gyur pa'o// chos bzhin ma yin par 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas nas las ma bsgrags bar 'dus par yang gyur ba'o// chos bzhin du ma 'dus pa gang zhe na//
gsol ba byas la las bsgrags pa dang/ ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o// chos bzhin du 'dus pa gang zhen/ gsol ba byushing las bsgrags la 'dus par yang gyur pa'o///
gzhan yang las rnam pa bzhi ste/ chos bzhin ma yin par mthun la ma 'dus pa dang/ chos nga zhin ma yin par mthun la 'dus pa dang/ chos bzhin du mthun la ma 'dus pa dang/
chos bzhin du mthun la 'dus pa'o// chos ra zhinam yin pa mthun la ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ sngar las bsgrags la phyis gsol ba byed cingam 'dus par yang gyur pa'o// chos
bzhin ma yin par mthun zhing 'dus pa gang zhen/ sder bsgrags la byis gsol ba byed cing 'dus par yang gyur pa'o// chos bzhin du mthun la ma 'dus pa gang zhen/ las de nyid kyis
gsol ba byas te las gzhan bsgrags la ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o// chos bzhin du mthun la 'dus pa gang zhen/ las de nyid kyis gsol ba byas shing las gzhan bsgrags la 'dus par
yang gyur pa'o/ btsunapa ma 'dus nga 'ilas zhes kyang bgyi/ 'dus pa'i las zhes kyang bgyin/ btsun pa ma 'dus pa'i las gang lags/ u pa li dge slong ji da pa rnams
kyis mtshams su yang phyin/ las la yang bab par gyur/ thams cad mngon sum du 'dus par gyur/ dad pa gling pa'i rigs pa yang dad pa blangs par gyur na/ dge slong rnams
ni zlog cing bstsal te/ de dag slar zlog cing 'khyal bzhin du las byas n de ni ma 'dus pa'i las zhes bya'o// 'dus pa'i las gang zhe na/ dge slong ji snyed pa rnamasamatshamasasu phyin cing
las la bab par gyur/ thamasacad kyang mngon sum du 'dus par gyur/ dad pa blang ba'i rigs pa yang dad pa blangs par gyur/ dge slong dag slar mi zlog cing 'khyal bar mi byed de//
dengag sla la zlog cing mi 'khyal bzhin du las byed bsan de ni 'dus pa'i las zhes bya'o// btsun pa dge 'dun thams cad 'dusate 'khod nas las bgyis kyang las dem 'dus pa las su 'gyur ba
mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ de ni 'di ltar gsol ba dang las byed pa na dge slong dag slar zlog cing 'khrul te/ de da ge slong srung zlog cing 'khyal bzhin/
las byed pa'o// btsun pa lus bgyidapa chud pa 'khor ba zhig gis las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun rnams ni 'das pa dang
wA bcas pa'o// btsun pachad pa 'khor ba zhig gis dad pa blangs nas las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'ag/ u pa li byas pa zhes bya sta/ dge slong de dag ni 'das pa dang/
bcas pa 'o// btsun pa dad pa gcig nas gcig tu blangs te las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun rnams ni 'dus pa dang bcas pa'o
btsun pa ma 'dus nga ra las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dag 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa gcig gis gcig la//
gcig gis gnyis la/ gcig gis gsum la/ gcig gis mang bo la las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li mi rung ngo// btsun pa gnyis kyis gcig la gnyis kyis
gnyis la/ gnyis kyis gsum la/ gnyis kyis mang po la las rnams bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li mi rung ngo// btsun pa gsuman+d+hagyis gcig la/ gsum gyis/
gnyis la gsum gyis gsum la/ gsum gyis mang po la la bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li mi rung ngo// btsun pa mang bos mang po la las bgyir rungangam/ sku pa
li mi rung ngo// btsun pa las bgyid pa gnas gcig tumachis la/ gnas bzhir las thams cad bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li rung ste/ de 'di ltar las byed pa'i dge slong
des gnas bzhi car gyi mtshams shing ngam/ 'dam bu 'am/ re ldes mnan te las byed pa'o// btsun pa las bgyid pas mtshams gcig par gsol ba gcig dang las gcig gis
gang zag bzhi la las bgyisan las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lim yin no// deci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshams gcig pa ramang pos mang po la las byar mi rung ngo// btsun
padage slong gis mtshams gcig lamatshungs par gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la las bgyis kyang nongs par yang mi 'gyur la// dge 'dun 'dus par yang mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa la
modad/ dod pa byin pas so// btsun pa las bgyid pa'i dgeslong gnas gcig namachis pas/ gang ba bzhi la las bgyis na las de yang bgyis par 'agyur la/ dge slong
de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa la yoded/ 'diltar las byed pa'i dge slong de mtshams mnan/ mtshams bzung nas mtshams su 'greng ma/
'dug nas mtshams kyi nang du gnyis 'dug/ mtshamasakyi phyi rol tu gnyis 'dugu pa la las byed pa'o/// mdor na mngonasum gyur dang snga ma
dag/ las rnam gsum dngashi ba dang// ma spyi dngang ni bod pa mtshams// nyos pa las kyang de bzhinano// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du gyur pa la
las rnams kyis shig ces gsungasan/ btsun pa dge 'dun gyis mngon sum dum gyur par las rnams bgyis kyang las rnams bgyis par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/
'di ltar yang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis phyag mi bya ba'i sdom pa dang/ longs spyod dang phral pa'i sdom pa byin pa dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis dge slong la smon pa'i sdom pa byin
bar gyur pa'o// btsun pa sngar las bsgrags te phyis gsol pa bgyis na bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'om/ u pa li byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag ni 'das pa dang bcas pa 'o//
btsun pa bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid spangs na sngangasapa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lisangs pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa bdag nyid kyis sbyangs te bdag nyidakyis bdag nyid la bzod par bgyid
na bzod pa bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li bzod pa byas pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa la bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma
yin no// de bzhin dusmad pa'i las bgyis pa la smad pa'i las bgyis pa dang/ bskrad pa'i las bgyis pa dang/ slar bsdum pa'i las bgyis pa dang/ mamathong
ba'i phyir spangs pa'i las bgyis pa dang/ slar gyi las ma bgyis pa dang/ sdigang la lta ba slar m btang ba'i phyir spangs ba'i las bgyis pa dang/ chad pas gcad pa la chad pa'i
dang yid mgu ba spyod pa la yid mgu ba'i drang/ 'byung ba'i phyiralas bgyis pa la 'byung ba'i las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// btsun
pa bsdigs pa'i las bgyid pa la smad pa'i las bgyid/ bskrad pa'i dang/ slar bsdum pa'i dang/ mamathong ba'i phyir spangs pa dang/ slar gyi las ma bgyis pa dang//
sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btung ba'i phyir spang ba'i las dang/ chad pas gcad pa'i dang/ yid magu ba'i dang/ dbyung ba'i las bgyidan las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li byas
ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du las thams cad kyang 'khor lo rgyud bzhin du bya'o// btsunapa bsdigs pa'i las su 'os pa zhig la smad pa dang/ bslad pa dang/ slar bsdum pa'i las
rnams bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li byas pa zhes bya ste/ sna dbab pa'i las so// btsunapa bsdigs pa'ilas su 'os pa zhig la mthong ba'i slad du sngangaso pa dang/
sumakhagyis pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang ba'i slad du spang ba'i las bgyisanalas bgyis pa zhes bgyi bam/ u pa lim byas pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyi zhe
kyi na u pa li sma dbab pa'i las ni gzhan no// spang ba'i las ni gzhanano// btsun pa bsdigs pa'i las su 'os pa zhig la chad pas gcad pa dang/ yid magu ba dang/ dbyung
wAba'i las bgyis na las bgyis bzhes bgyi 'am/ u b.lam byas pa zhes bya'o// daci'i phyir zhen/ smadabab pa'i lasani gzhanano// rnam par dag pa'i las ni gzhan no//
pa btsun pam mthong ba'i slad du sngang ba'i las su 'os pa zhig la slar las ma bgyis pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang ba'i slad du spang ba'i las shig bgyis las bgyis pa zhes bgyi/
'am u pa li byas pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de dag thams cad ni spangs ba'i las so// btsunapamamathong ba'i re ngaba'i las su 'os pa zhig la bsdigs/
pa dang/ snyad pa dang/ bskrad pa dang/ slar bsdum pa'i las shig bgyisan las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma byas pa zhes bya'o// deci'i phyir zhen/ u
ba mi snang ba'i las ni gzhan/ smadabab pa'i las ni gzhanano// btsun pa mamathong ba'i slad du spang ba'i las su 'os pazhig la chad pasagacad ba dang/ yid magu ba dang/ dbyung
ba'i las bgyis na bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u ba lim byas pa zhes bya ste/ dwaci'i phying zhen/ u ba li spang ba'i las ni gzhan/ rnam par dag pa'i las ni gzhan no//
btsun pa nad pas gtad par 'os pa zhig la yid mgu ba dang/ dbyung ba'i las bgyisan las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'tsha/ u pa la byas pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/
u pa la 'di dag thams cad ni rnam par dag pa'i las so// btsunapa chad pas gcad par 'os pa zhig la bsdigs pa dang/ smad pa dang/ bskyed pa dang/ slar bsdum pa'i
las bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma byas pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ u pa li rnam par dag pa'i las ni gzhan/ smadabab pa'i las ni gzhonano/
btsun pa chad pas gcad par 'os pa zhig la ma mthong ba'i phyir spang ba'i las bgyis sam/ slar gyi las ma bgyis pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba saram btang ba'i slad duslang ba'i las
bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma byas pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ u pa li rnam par dag pa'i las nigazhan/ sbyang nga'i las ni gzhan no// btsun
pa las gzhan gyis gsol ba bgyis la/ las gzhan gyis bsgrags nalas bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ ub la ma byas pa zhes bya sta/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o//
ga kha tsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyisazhigang zag byis pa dang/ glenapa dang/ migasal ba dang/ mimakhas ba dang/ ngo tsha med pa rang da tshigami brtan pa dang/
yi dam las nyams pa dang/ sngon zhes khyung ba dang/ sngar 'khrugs pa dang/ skyonapa dang/ rnam pa bcus dkrugs kyang 'khrugs par mi 'gyur rozhes gsungasan/ btsun pa de su
chos bzhinam lags par las bgyid cing/ de dag kyang slar zlog slar dkrugs te/ de dag gis slar zlog slar dkrugs na slar dkrugs pa mi btsananam/ u pa li btsanate/ ngas chos bzhin/
gyi las la dgongs te gsungs pas na/ gang lachos bzhin las byed pa de lasar zlog ba dang dkrugs pa ni mi khatsanano// btsun pa gang 'gabacu ma tis kyi las so ba'i tshadang/ bstanapar
rdzogs pa grags pa la bsnyan par rdzogs par bgyis pa'i/ dbyung b.rarigs pa la 'byin pa'i tshosar zlog cing slar dkrugs te// bdag la las ma byed cig ces mchin/ de dag gis
cha klog pa dang sar dkrugs pa mi 'dr-in nam/ u pa li btsano// chad pa'i las la ngas dgongs te gsungs so// btsun pa las bgyid pa zhig la bgyid pa'i tsho dus 'das na las bgyis/
ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li da ste las mang du byas pa de'ang dus 'das nalas byas pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa tAbar phyogs ba dang lhan cig kun tu sdud par bgyi 'am/ kun tu mi spyad par bgyi//
0/ u pa la nye bar phyogs pa dang lhan cig kun tu mi spyad par bya'o// btsun pa sangs pa de grogs zhes bgyi 'am/ grogs ma lags pa zhes bgyi/ u pa 'islas pa thams cad ni grogs ma
yin pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'angs kyis bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa la bzod pa stsol cig ces gsungasan/ btsun pa gang du bzod pa stsal bar bgyi/ mtshams kyinang/
du'o ji ltar bzod pa gsol bar bgyi/ smra 'grengab 3labazhin du dge 'dun la skya bsal te 'byung bar stsol zhing phyag 'tshal bar ston 3 mtshams kyinang du 'dug nas bzod pa gsol te sa ba
mthong ba'o// btsun ba su gang la dge 'dunagyi nang du lan gsum du bsgo 'ang slar m btang ba de dag thams cad nongs par 'gyur ram/ su gang lanongs pa byung ba de dag thams cad kyang lan gsum du
bsgo ngar bgyi 'am/ su gang zhig dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum du bgo yangs ma btang ba de dag thams cad la nyes par 'gyur ro// nongs pa byung yang de dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum
du ba sgro mi 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ bsgo ba'i rigs pa bzhi bsgo bar 'os pa ma gtogs par de las nyes pa gzhan byung ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
kyis ni chos gang dang ldan pa'i dge slong de la smra dbab pa'i las dang/ sngang ba'i las dang/ rnam par dag pa'i las rnams bya'o zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa de ste dge slong ma la yang de lta bu 'o
dachos dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag la yang las de rnams ba gyi 'am/ u pa la bya'o// btsun pa de ste dge slobam dang/ dge tshul ma dang/ dge tshul pa
rnams chos de dag dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag la yang las de rnams bgyi 'am/ u pa li rnam par dag pa'i las ma gtogs par las gzhan rnams ni bya'o/ mdoban
smon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang// 'on pa glen pa gnyid log dang// rarobadang chos pa dang// soms zhugs 'gro bde bzhinamtshan// mning nag la sogs pa dang// bslab
pa byin pa thama'o// btsun pa sbyo na pa la las brgyad na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ upa 'i smon nga la sdom pa byin pa ma gtogs nga 'i las lhag ma rnams ni de ste slar dge slong
du 'du shes yod cing/ las 'di ni bdag la byed do bar shes na las byas pa zhes bya'o// sems 'khrugs pa dang/ nad kyis gzir ba dang/ glen pa dang/ lhug pa dang/
zhwa 'onapa rnams kyang de bzhin no// btsun pa gnyid kyis log pa zhig la las bgyid na las bgyis ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li de ste lus sa ma ngag gis dmigs nas/ gsol ba dang las
ba byas pa'i tshig nyid kyis logan las byas pa zhes bya'o/// de bzhin dumyos pa dang/ larob dang/ snyoms par zhugs pa rnams la yang brjod par bya'o// btsun pa 'gro ba gzhan du gnas
pa zhig la las bgyid na las ba gyi sa ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li lhung bzed khas dbub pa ma gtogs talas lhag ma rnams ni byas pa zhes bya'o// btsunapa gang la las bgyid pa de'i na tshan sgyuran
las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li byas pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa ma ning zhig la las bgyidan las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lim byas pa zhes bya'o// de bzhinadu dge
slong ma sun phyung banas/ sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// btsun pa za ma zhig la las bgyidan las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma byas ba zhes bya'o// btsunang
dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang/ skabar phyogasapa dang/ bslab ba stsal ba rnams la las bgyidan las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni
'das pa dang bcas pa'o//// mdor na [. ]smon pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang/ na ba 'on pa sman pa dang// khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang// bslab ba byin dang de bzhin
mtshan// btsun pa las brgyud pa smyonapa zhigagos las bgyis bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ ma bgyis pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li de ste dge slong du 'du shes slar redacing gsol ba
byas te las ma nyams na byas pa zhes bya'o// soms 'khrugs pa dang/ nad kyis gzir ba dang/ klan pa dang/ lhug pa dang/ 'on pa rnams kyang de bzhinano// btsun
[/]ga pa las ba byed pa 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa zhig gis bgyis na bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li de bzhin no// de bzhin du las brgyad pa khyim pa dang/
tham dang/ mning dang lhan cig mi gnas ba dang/ so sor gnas pa dang/ sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag gis las bagling las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no/
btsun pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang/ nye bar phyogs pa dang/ bslab pa stsal ba rnams kyis las bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li byas pa zhes bya ste/
dge 'dunani 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa las bgyid pas las bgyid pan mtshan rgyun las bgyis ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u ba la byas pa zhes bya'o// jiltar las byed pa de
bzhin du grangs su bsang bas kyang brjod par bya'o// las kyi dngos po ste dmangaskya'i dngos po rdzogasaso/// mdor na chad pa rnam pa bdun du byas// gnas
gsum dang ni mustags can// bsgrags pa dang ni nyes pa dang// mtshan dang sbyin pa ma yin pa'o// btsun pa gang brag de nyid chad ba bgyid pa lags la/danyidatshad pa 'khor ba yang la de

yidamag kha rgod ba la khral gang zag de nyid kyis yid mgu bar sbyang lags bar 'gyur ba mchisogam kub li 'odir/ de 'di ltar gang zag yid mgu bar spyad zin pa las dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i zhes pa byung ste/ de dag 'dun la yid
mgu bar bya ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la yid mgu bar bya ba byinata/ de yang mgu bar bya ba stodapa na/ de yang dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa gnyis byung ste/ gcig ni zhag
gcig tu bcabs pa'o// gcigani zhag gnyis su bcabs nas/ des zhes pa de dag gi phyir dge 'dun las chadapar bya ba gsol pa dang/ de la dge 'dun gyis kyang chad par byed
pa byin no// des zhag gcig tu chad pa byas te/ de'i nyes pa gcig gi chad pani byas so// gnyis pa'i chad pan byed/ gsum dun yid mgu bar bya ba spyod/ bzhi pa ni yid mag
bar bya ba spyad pa'o// btsun pa chad pa bgyid pa'i rigs pa zhig la yid mgu bar bgyid pa stsalan stsal ba zhes bgyi 'am u pa li byin pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas
ba'o btsun pa tshad ba brgyad pa'i rigs pa'i gang zag cig byung nabyung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa la phyung ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dunani 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsunar yid
mgu bar bgyid pa rigs pa'i gang zag la chad pa brgyad pa lanastsal ba zhes bgyi 'om/ u pa lim yin te/ dge 'dun la yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa yid mgu bar
bgyidapararigs pa'i gang zag cige phyung na ltung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li phyung ba zhes bya sta/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa dbyung bar rigs pa'i gang zag la chad pa
rgya kha gyid du stsalan stsal ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lim yin te/ dge 'dun la yang 'dus pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa dbyung bar rigs pa'i gang zag gcig
yid mgu b.rab gying ba stsalan stsal ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin te/ dge 'dun la yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa las bgyid pa phyogs gcig tu mchis la gnas
bzhir chad pa bgyid pa dang/ yid magu bar bgyid pa stsol cing dbyung ba'i las kyang bgyid par rung ngam u pa li de 'di ltar las byed pa'i dge slong de gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/
dbyig pa 'am/ re ldes nan te las byed na rung ngo// btsun pa las bgyid pa'i gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/ dbyig pa 'am/ re ldes mnan tegasol ba gcig dang las gcig
gis gang zag bzhil chadapa bgyidapa dang/ yid mgu bar bgyid pa dang/ 'byung ba'i las rnams bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na//
u pa li mtshams gcig pa la mang pos mang bo la las byar mi rung ngo// btsunapa dge slong zhig gis mtshams gcig na gnas shing lhan cig tu 'khod pa'i dge slong de dgamamachis bzhin du chad pa
bgyid pa dang/ yid mgu bar bgyid pa dang/ dbyung ba'i las bgyid kyang nongs par ma 'gyural/ des dge 'dunal yang mi mthunapar mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/
0 dadapa rjes su phul ba'o// btsun pa las bgyid pa'i dge slong phyogs gcig tu mchis nas gang zag bzhi lachad ba bgyid pa dang/ yid magu bar bgyid pa'i las bgyid na las kyang/
bgyis par 'gyur la/ dge slong de dag kyang 'dus pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ 'di ltar las byed pa'i dge slong des mtshams mnan mtshams
bzung ste// mtshams su 'grengangam/ 'dug kyang rung/ gnyis mtshams kyi nang du bzhag/ gnyis nimatshams kyi phyi rol pa zhig ste byed ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan
'das kyis ni chad ba bgyidapa gnyis thog gcig pa'i gnas su ma gnas shig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa chad pa bskyed pa gnyis thog gcig pa'i gnas su gnas kyang nongs par mi 'gyur
ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ sngonamu stags can dang lhan cig gnasana'o// btsun pa nongs pa gang yang ma byung ba de 'ang chad pa bgyid pa mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ sngonamu
stags canano// btsun pa dge 'dun gyi lhag ma ma byung ba zhig la chad pa bgyid du stsalakyang nos par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ mu stags can la'o// btsunab dgeslong
zhig gis nongs pa'i ming dang rigasam bsgrags na bcabs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li bcabs pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa de sta rigs bsgrags la ming ma bsgrags na bcabs ba zhes bgyi 'am/
dbatsun pa chad pa bgyid pa bzhi gnas gcig nachad pa bgyid dam yid mgu bar bgyi ba stod du rung ngam/ u pa li mi rung ste/ mang pos mang po la chad par bya ba 'am//
yid mgu bar bya ba mi spyad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni chad pa byed pa gnas gzhan du ma gnas shigaces gsungasan/ btsun pa de ste gnas gzhan du gnasan zhaka ba grong bar bgyi
'am gu pa li ma yin no// btsun pa 'phags pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i nang du nga tshe slong la nongs pa smras pa dang/ dge slong des kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na sbas pa zhes bgyi 'am/
u pa lim yin no/ bcabs par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa 'phags pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dge slong la nongs pa smras pa dang/ dge slong des kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skadam 'tshal
na smas pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// btsun pa dge slong mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dge slong la nong pa smras pa dang/ dge slong des kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad
ma 'tshalanasmas pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lim yin no// bcabs bar 'gyur ram/ u pa li mi 'gyur ro// btsun ba mtha'a'akhob pa zhig gis 'phags pa skad du dgeslong la nongs pa sbas
na smras pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lim yin no// bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li mo 'gyur ro// btsun pa nongs pa lus kyis dmigs shing stonan snas pa zhes bgyi 'am/
u b.li ma yin no// btsunapa dben la mi dben par 'du shes nas nongs pa smras n smras pa zhes bgyi lam 3 pa li ma yin no// bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li mi 'gyur ro//
btsun ba dge slong zhig gis snyananam sngags kyis bdag mi snang bar bgyis te nongs ba smras nastsas pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lim yin no// bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li mi 'gyur ko/
btsun pa su la gnas pa dag gis nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams la chad pa bgyi ba 'am/ yid magu bar bgyi ba 'am/ dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyis las bgyis ba zhes bgyi 'am/
u pa lim yin no// btsun pa namamakha' la gnas pa dag gis sa la gnas pa rnams la chad pa bgyi ba 'am/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba 'am/ dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyidan las bgyis
zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// btsun pa sa la gnas pa dag gis nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyi grangs su bskang ste/ chad par bgyi ba 'am/ yid magu bar bgyib 'am
dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyidan las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// btsun pa nam mkha' la gnas pa dag gis sa la gnas pa rnams kyi grangs su bskang// chad par bgyi
ba 'am/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba 'am/ dbyung ba'i las kyang rang bgyis na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// de bzhin dumatshams kyinang na gnas pa dang/
khya/ dau pa li ma yin no// btsun pa dge 'dun gyi lhagam dulas byung/ u pa li jacu gsum las so/ btsun pa dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi lhaganongs ba zhig/
byung las bshags shing slar ma bgyis bzhin byang bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yodi/ 'di ltarangage slong de thun mong ma yin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhagam zhig byung sa gyural/ de'i mtshan
'phos te dge slong mar gyur na de la dge 'dun gyi lhag ma las ni byung gi/ nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o// btsun padage slong ma zhig gis dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nongs pa zhig byung la ma
bshags shing sar ma bgyis bzhin byang bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u ba li yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong ma de thun mong ma yin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i zhes pa zhig byung bar gyur la/ de'i

mtshan 'phos te dge slong phar gyur la dge 'dun gyi lhag ma las ni byung gi/ nyes byas kyi ltung ba ni bshags par bya'o// btsun pa dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nongs pa las byung bzhin slar yang nongs pa de ba bkra/
bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ 'di ltar yang dge slong des thun mong ma yin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhagama'i nyis pa byung bar gyur pa dang/ de'i mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur nas dge 'dun

gyi lhag ma byung ba dang/ de slar yang mtshan 'phos te dge slong du gyur na nyes pa de bshags dgos so// btsun pa dge slong zhig chad pa spyod pa las/ de mtshan 'phos te dge mar gyur na chad pa bral ba
zhes bgyi 'am/ u ba lim yinatu/ dge slong ma la rmad pa bya'o// btsunang dge slong de yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyod pa namtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur nachad pa bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa

lim yin te/ jitsam du spyad pa de grongs la dge 'dun sde gnyis la zla ba phyed du songs shig/ btsun pa dge slong ma zhig chad pa spyod pa namtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur na chad pa bral ba zhes bgyi 'am//

u pa li ma yin te/ drage slong pha la chad pa byos shig/ btsun pa dge slong ma zhig yid mgu bar bgyib sbyod pa na mtshan 'phos te/ dge slong par gyur na chad pa bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ du pa li ma yinate/
zhag drug tu gros la phyung zhig/ btsun pa bslab pa stsal bas dge slong khachadapar bgyi ba dang yid magu bar bgyi ba stsal bar rung ngam/ u pa li mi rung ngo/ btsun pa bslang ba stsal ba

chad par bgyi ba dang/ mchad bar khyamadang/ ying mgu bar bgyi ba stsal bar rung ngam yang magu bar bgyi bstsal bar rung ngam/ na pa la mi rung ngo/// mdor na/ zhes dang de bzhin mtshan mo dang// skung rnams dang yang bzhi pa dang/
lus dang dbon dang de bzhin sngags// bzhi pa gnyis dang sbyangs pa'o// btsun pa nongs pa dngabacas pas dge slong la chad pa bgyi ba dang/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba stsal b.rarung ngam//
u pa li mi rung ngo// btsun pa nongs pa dang bcas pa las chad par bgyi ba 'am/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba sbyang du rangungam/ u pa li mi rung ngo// de bzhin du grongs su skong ba'ang brjod par bya'o//
[g]da/ mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pa rnams su lhan cig rnam pa bzhir byos shig// bam po nyi shu pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das la// rmadang ldan pa u pa li zhus pa// btsun pa dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i chos bstugasum po 'di rnams las/ khu ba las byung ba zhag gcig bcabs pa nas/ tshig bka' blo mi bde
wA ba las byung ba zhag bcu gsum bcabs pa'i bar du sta/ btsun pa nongs pa bcu gsum po de dag dus thadang ba mi 'dra ba bcabs pa'i rnams la gsol ba gcig dang las gcig gis chad pa bgyid du
stsal b.rarung ngom/ u pa li rung ngo/ khatsunupachad pa 'khor nas yid mgu bar bgyid du sul ba rang ngag/ u pa li rung ngo// yid mgu nga bgyi ba sdud lags pa las dbyung ba stsal du rung
ma u pa li rung ngo// btsun nga dge 'dun gyi lhag mnongs pa mang po mi 'dra ba las byung ba'i rnams / gsol ba gcig dang las gcig gis dus gcig tu gzhan la chadang bgyid pa dang/
ny+nyo gzhanal yid magu bar bgyid pa dang/ gzhan la dbyung ba stsal du rung ngam/ u pa li mi rung ngo// btsun pa dge 'dun gyi lhag ma nongs pa mang po ma 'dra ba las byung ba rnams gsol
ba gcig dang las gcig gis dus gcig tu gang zag gcig la chad pa dang/ yid magu bar bgyi ba dang/ 'byung ba rnams stsal du rung ngam/ u pa li ming du bo
na smon pa sems 'khrugs nad kyis gzer// 'on klon gnyid log ra ro ba// smos dang goms zhugs 'gro ba mtshan// khyim pa dag lasogs pa dang// bslab pa byin pa thama'o//
btsunab smonapa zhig gis nongs pa sasan sbas pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// bcabs par 'gyur ram/ upa li mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sems 'khrugs
pa dang/ nad kyis gzir ba rnams so// btsun pa smyon pa zhig la nongs pa sbasan sbas pa zhes bgyi kham/ u pa lim yin no// bcabs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no//
de bzhin dusems 'khrugs pa dang/ nad kyis gzer ba dang/ glen pa dang/ 'on pa dang/ lhug pa dang/ gnyid log pa dang/ myos pa dang/ raro ba dang/ goms par zhugs pa rnams //
lasas na smras pa zhes bgyi bam u pa li ma yin no// bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li mi 'gyur ro// 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa zhig la nongs pa sbasanasmas pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa la smras pa zhes
bya'o bcabs par 'gyur ma/ u pa li mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mning dang/ dge slong ma sun phyungapa nas/ sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag lanongs par smras na snas
nga zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li smas pa zhes bya'o/ bcabs par 'gyurangam u pa li mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa dge slong tha ma zhig la nongs par smras nasmras pa zhes bgyi lam/ u pa//
li smas pa zhes bya'o// bca pas par 'gyur ram/ u pa li mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du da ge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang/ mi gnas pa dang/ so sor gnas pa dang/
na par phyogs pa dang/ bslab pa stsal ba rnams la nongs ba sa na smras pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li sprus pa zhes bya'o// bcabs par 'gyuraram/ u pa li mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa
wa dge slong gis nongs pa sla ba na mtshan 'phosan sbas pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li smas pa zhes bya'o// bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li ma yin no// btsun pa dge slong gis
dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nongs pa zhig byung na nam 'tsho'i bar dudabyung du mi rung ba mchis sam u pa li yod de/ ji ltaradage slong gis pas pham pa bzhi'i 'os pa las gang yang rung/ 3 'das
pa de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyos pa zhig byung ba'o// mdor na/ skyon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang/ dkon glen gnyid log ra ro ba// myos dang snyoms zhugs 'gro ba
mtshan// mning dag la sogs pa dang// bslab pa sbyin pa thum 'o// btsun pa smyon pa zhig la chad pa dang/ yid magu bar bgyi ba dang/ dbyung ba'i las rnams bgyid na
bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li des slar dge slong du 'ang shes pa de nyid dam/ lus dang ngag gis kyang dmigs shing las 'di ni bdag la byed par shes na las byas pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du
sems 'khrugs pa dang/ nad kyis gzir ba dang/ glen pa dang/ lag pa dang/ 'on pa rnams la'ang brjod par bya'o// btsun po gnyid log pa dang raro ba zhig la chad pa dang/
yid mgu bar bgyi ba dang/ dbyung ba'i las rnams bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'ag/ u ba la de ste lus sam ngag gis dmigs pa las gsol pa byed pa'i tshe/ gnyid kyis log
na'ang byas pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du ra ro ba dang myos pa dang soms par zhugs pa rnams la yang brjod par bya'o// btsu nang 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa'i dge slong zhig la chad pa
dang yid mgu bar bgyi ba 'am/ dbyung ba 'ong rung las bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa 'bi ma yin no// de bzhin du ma ning dang/ dge slong ma sunaphyung ba dang/
mi gnasapa dang/ so sor gnas pa nas/ sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar dubarjod par bya'o// btsun pa dge slong za ma zhig la chad pa dang/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba 'am/ ngabyung
ba'ang rung las bgyid nalas bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma byas pa zhes bya'o// btsunapa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa'i dge slong dang/ lhabar phyogs pa dang/ bslab pa
stsal ba zhig la chad pa dang/ yid mgu bar bgyi 'am/ dbyung ba'ang rungalas bgyid na las bgyis pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun dag kyang
'das pa dang bcas pa'o// gang zag gi dngos po dang chadapa'i dngos po rdzogs so// mdor na/ 'phrin pa spring yig lag brda dang//
gzhan zer ba dang gcig nas gcig/ smon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang// 'on pa drag dang klan pa dang// mning dag la sogs pa dang// bslab ba byin pa tha ma 'o// btsun
pa dge slong zhig gis 'phrin gyis gso sbyin bkag pa na bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am u pa li ma yin no// de bzhin dusbring yig dang/ lag brda dang/ gzhan zer ba dang/ gcig nas
gcig tu brgyad de gso sbyin bkagan gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am u pa li ma yin no/ sems 'khrugs pa dang/ nad kyis gzir ba dang/ glen pa dang/ lhug pa dang//
'on pa dang/ ma ning dang/ dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang/ pha dang ma dang/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang/ ma stags can
D+ha dang mu stags can du song ba dang/ rkun gnase dang/ mi gnas pa dang/ so sor gnas pa dang/ 3bar phyogs pa dang 3 sngon zhes pa byung ba dang/ sder 'khrugs pa rnams kyang de
bzhin no// btsun pa bslab pa stsal ba zhig gis gso sbyin bkagan bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pali ma yin no// btsun pa zam zhig gis gso sbyin bkagan gso sbyin bkag nga zhes bgyi lam/
upa lim yin no/// mdor na/ smonapa gyur dang sems 'khrugs dang// nad kyis gzir dang 'on klan nga// gnyid log romos pa dang// snyoms par zhugs dang 'gro ba
mtshan// ma ning dag la sogs pa dang// bslab pa byin pa tha ma 'o// khatsun pa son pa zhig la gso sbyin bkag na gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li yin no//
dang zhin du sams 'khrugs pa dang/ nad kyis gzir ba dang/ glen pa dang/ lhug pa dang/ 'onopa dang/ gnyid log pa dang/ la rngo ba dang/ myos pa dang/ snyoms par zhugs pa//
la yang brjod par bya'o// btsun pa 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa zhig la gso sbyin bkagan gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li bkag pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa de bzhin du mning nas/ bslab pa
stsal ba rnams kyi bar du gso sbyin bkagan gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa za ma zhig la gso sbyin bkag na gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u
ba li bkag pa zhes bya'o/ 7/ mdor na/ skad dang lus dang dban dang sngags// mig dang rna ba de bzhin te// mtshams dang sa dang de bzhin gnas// gso sbyin yin te tham 'o
dbatsun pa 'phags pa zhig gis 'bags pa'i skad du gso sbyin bakag pa dang/ dge slong de dag kyang 'phags pa'iskadam 'tshalan gso sbyin bakag pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma/
[d ]// yin no// de bzhin du rnam pa bzhir rgyas par bya'o// btsun pa dge slong zhig gis lus kyi dmigs bas gso sbyin bkag nagaso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am/
u pa lim yin no// btsun pa dben pa la mi dben par 'du shes te gso sbyin bkagan gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// btsun pa dge slong zhig gis sngags sam sman
gyis bdag mi snang bar bgyis te gso sbyin bkagan gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa lim yin no// btsun ba lha'i mig gis mthong ste gso sbyin bkagan gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa lo
ma bkagab zhes bya ste dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa lha'i rna bas thos te gso sbyin bkagan gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am kA u pa li ma yinato/ dag 'dun yang 'das pa dang
bcas pa'o// btsun pamatshams kyi nanganamachis pas mtshams kyi snangarol na mchis pa rnams la/ gso sbyin bkag ni gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am/ chung li ma yin no// btsunang mtshams kyi
slar rol namachis pa zhig gis mtshams kyi nang namachis pa rnams la/ gso sbyin bakagan gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// btsun pa sa la gnas pa zhig gis nam mkha' la gnas pa
rnams kyigs sbyin bkagan gso sbyin bkag pa zhes bgyi 'am/ a ba li ma yin no// btsun pa nam mkha' la gnas pa zhig gis sa la gnas pa rnams kyi gso sbyin bkagan gso sbyin bakag pa zhes bgyi/
'am[u0f10 ]u pa lim yin no// btsun pa dge slong zhig phyogs gcig tu mchis nas gnas bzhir gang brag bzhi la gso sbyin bkagan/ gso sbyin bakag par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ ur li yod de/ 'diltar
dge slong des gnas bzhi'imatshams su shing ngam/ 'dam bu 'am/ re ldes mtshams su mnan te gso sbyin bakagan bkag pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa dge slong zhig gis dge slong legaso sbyin bgag kyang bkag
ba mi 'gyur bamachis sam/ u pa li yod de/ de bkra shis kyi gso sbyin gdon pa'o// mdor na: gleng ba dran par bya de bzhin// skabs 'byed pa dang smra bar bya// lung dbog pa
dang 'gog pa dang/ gso sbyin dag dang skabs dbye ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'adas kyis skabs phye nas gleng bar bya'o// dran par bya'o zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa skabs phye ba
la blangs shing dran nga ra bgyisananongs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba mchisasam/ u pa li yod de/ skabs phyi ba btang nas glangs pa dang dran par byas pa'o// btsun pa chos bzhin dugang du gleng
b.rab gyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o// btsun pa chos bzhin du gang du dran par bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o// btsun pa chos bzhin du gang du skabs dbye bar bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o// btsun

pa chos bzhin dugang du ts+tshabar bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o// btsun pa chos bzhin du lung dbog pa gang dudagag par bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o// btsun pa chos bzhin du/bas 'byed po gang du dgag par bgyi//
@#/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o// btsun pa skabs 'byed par gsol ba gang du bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o// btsun pa gang du skabs dbye bar bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o//
btsun ba chos bzhin dung gyi ba rnams gang du bgyi/ dge 'dun gyinang du'o// btsun pa chos bzhin du brtsad pa gang du bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'o// btsunang chos bzhin kyi yi dam gang du bgyi/ dge
'dun gyi nang du'o// btsun pa chos bzhin du gso sbyin dagag pa ni du/ chos bzhinam lags pa ni du/ chos bzhin ma yin par gso sbyin dgag pani gcig go/ chos bzhinapa'angagacig go/ chos bzhinam yin
bzhiganyis te/ chos bzhin pa'ang gnyis so// chos bzhinam yin pa ni gsum ste/ chos bzhinapa'ang gsum mo// chos bzhin ma yinab nibazhi ste/ chos bzhin pa'ang bzhi'o// chos bzhin ma yin pa ni lnga ste//

chos bzhin pa'ang lnga'o// chos bzhinamayinab ni drug ste/ chos bzhinapa'ang drug go/ chos bzhin ma yin pa ni bdunate/ chos bzhin babang bdun no// chos bzhinam yin pa ni brgyud de/ chos bzhinang 'ang brgyad do/

chosabazhin ma yin pa ni dgu sta/ chos bzhinapa'ang dgu'o// chos bzhin ma yin pa ni banuste/ chos bzhin pa'ang bcu'o// chos bzhinam yin ngas gso sbyin dagag pa gcig gang zhe na/ byas pa la gzhi med pa sa
gso srin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyin 'agog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'agog pa'o// 'di ni chos bzhin ma yin pasagaso sbyin 'gog pa//

gcig dang chos ngazhin yang gcig ko/ chos bzhin ma yin pa gnyis dang chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa gnyis po gang zhe na/ ji ltar yang de ni dge slong gis dge slong la byas pa la gzhi med pa dang/ mabyas
pa la gzhid pas gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin pas gso srin 'gog pa'o// byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog
pa'o chos bzhin ma yin pa gsum dang chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'ogog pa gsum gang zhen/ ji ltar yang de ni dge slong gis dge slong la byas pa la gzhi med pa dang/ ma byas pa la gzhimad pa dang/
byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhimadapas gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin pas gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang/ ma cus pa la gzhi yod pa dang/ byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi/
yod pas gso sbyin 'gog pa'ichos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// chos bzhin ma yin pa gzhi dang/ chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa bzhi po gang zhe na/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ lta ba nyams pa dang/

spyod pa nyams pa dang/ 'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhimod pa bzhis gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin pas gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ lta ba nyams pa dang/ spyod pa nyams pa dang/

'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhi yod pa bzhis gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos ngazhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// chos bzhin ma yin pa lnga dang/ chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog balngapo gang zhe na/ pas pham pa dang/ dge
bya@#// 'dun gyi lhag ma dang/ ltung ba dang/ so sor bshagasapadang/ nyes byas rnams la gzhimad pas gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhinum yin pas gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// phas pham pa
dang 3 dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang/ ltung ba dang/ so sor bshags pa dang/ nyes byas rnams la gzhi yod pas gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// chos bzhin ma yin pa drug dang/

chos bzhin du gso spyin 'gog pa drug po gang zhen/ lhag ma yod pa byas ba la gzhi med pa dang/ lhag ma yod nga ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang/ lhag ma yod pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang/
lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi mdapa dang/ lhagamamad pa ma byas pa la gzhimadapa dang/ lhagam mad pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhimad pas gso sbyin 'gog bani chosabazhinam yin pas gso sbyin
gog ba'o/ chos bzhin du gso srin 'gog pa drug po gang zhe na/ lhag ma yod pa byas pa la gzhi yong pa dang/ lhag ma yod pam byas ba la gzhi yodapa dang/ lhag ma yod pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi

yod pa dang/ lhagamamed pam byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang/ lhagamamed pa la gzhi yod pa dang/ lhagam mdapabyas pad ma byas pa la gzhi yodapAgaso sbyin 'gog bani chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// chos bzhinam
yin pa bdun dang/ chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa bdun po gang zhen/ pas pham pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang/ ltung ba dang/ so sor bshags pa dang/ nyes byas dang/ lta ba
nyams pa dang/ 'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhimad pas gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin ra sa gso srin 'gog pa'o// phas pham pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang/ ltung ba dang/ so
sor bshags pa dang/ nyes byas dang/ lta ba nyams pa dang/ 'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyin 'gog bzhi chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// chos bzhin ma yin pa brgyad dang//
chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa brgyad gang zhen/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ spyod pa nyams pa dang/ lta nga nyams pa dang/ 'tsho ba nyams pas byas pa la gzhi mad ba dang tshul khrims nyams pa

dang lta ba nyams pa dang/ spyod pa nyams pa dang 'tsho ba nyams par ma byas pa la gzhimad pas gso sbyin 'agog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin pas gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ spyod pa nyams
pa dang/ lta ba nyams pa dang/ 'tsho ba nyams par byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ lta ba nyams pa dang/ spyod pa nyams pa dang/ 'chob nyams par ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso

sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso srin 'gog pa'o// chos bzhin ma yin pa dgu dang/ chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa dgu po gang zhe na/ lhagam dang bcas pa byas pa la gzhi med pa dang/ lhagam dang bcas

bam byas pa la gzhimad pa dang/ lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi mad pa dang/ lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi mad pa dang/ lhagom med pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang/ lhagamamed pa byas
po dngam byas pa la gzhi med pa dang/ lhag malod pa dang lhagam mad pa byas pa la gzhi mad pa dang/ lhag ma dang bcas pa dang/ lhagamamad pa ma byas pa la gzhimed pa dang/
lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag mamed nga byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhimad bas gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin pas gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang/
rgyu lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang/ lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang/ lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang/ lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la

gzhi yod pa dang/ lhag mamadapa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang/ lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang/ lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhaganamed pa ma byas pa la
gzhi yodapa dang/ lhag ma dang bcas pa dang/ lhagam mad pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyin 'gog pani chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// chos bzhin du gso srin 'gog pa bzhu
gang zhen/ phas pham pa yin/ phas pham pa'i gtam la zhugs pa yin/ tshul khrims nyams pa yin/ lta ba nyams pa yin/ spyod pa nyams pa yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa yin/ bslab ba phul ba yin/
bslab pa phul ba'i gtam la zhugs pa yin/ dge 'dun la dpus 'dogs pa yin/ dag 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa'i gtam la zhugs pa yin no// de la ji ltar na phas pham pa yin zhe na/ gang gi rnam pa dang/
gang gi tshul dang/ gang gi mtshanams dge slong phas bam pa'i nyes pa byung ba de'i rnam pa dang/ de'i tshul dang/ de'i mtshanams dge slong pa sa tham pa'i nyes pa byung ba mthong ba yin no// de des
mthong bas gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa yin to/ de ltar nams pham pa yin no// ji ltar na phas pham pa'i gtam la zhugs pa yin zhen/ ji ltar yang de ni gtsug lag khang
ngam: gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol yang rung/ dug slong mang po 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa rnams kyang/ de las byung ba de dang mthun pa de'i rang bzhin gyi gtam la zhugs pa yinate/ dad pa las thos

kyang rung bdag rang rnam pa la dogs pa skyes kyang rung ste/ de des thos pa dang dogs pas gso sbyin 'gog pani chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// ji ltanganatshul khrims nyams pa yin zhen/ phas pham pa/

bzhi las gang yang rung nga sa pham pa shin tu 'das par gyur pa'o// ji ltar na lta nga nyams pa yin zhen/ lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis las gang yang rung ste lta bar gyur pa rab tu thob pa yin no// ji ltaran sbyod pa

nyams nga ra gyur pa yin zhe na/ mi spyad pa'i rnams sbyod pa sta/ dge slong gi bslab pa rnams la mi slob pa'o// ji ltaran 'tsho ba nyams pa yin zhen/ 'tsho ba yongs sum dag pa yin no// ji ltaran bslab pa phul

ba yin zhe na/ gang gi rnam pa dang/ gang kitshul dang/ gang gi mtshanams dge slong bslab pa 'bul nga de'i rnam pa dang/ de'i tshul dang/ de'i mtshan mas dge slong dumathong ba yin te/ de des mthong nas gso
dasrin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// ji ltaran bslab pa phul ba'i gtam la zhugs pa yin zhen/ ji ltar yang de ni gtsug lag khang ngam/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi

co na'ang rung/ dge slong rnams 'dus te 'khod pa de dag kyang de las byung ba de dang mthun pa de'i rang bzhin gyi gtam la zhugs pa yin te/ dad pa 'a sa shos kyang rang/ bdag nyid rnam pa la dogs pa skyes
kyang rung ste/ de des thos pa dang/ de'i dogs pas gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// jiltar na dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa yin zhe na/ gang gi rnam pa dang/ gang gi tshul dang/

gang gi mtshanams dge slong gi dge 'dun la smod pa de lta bu'i rnam pa dang/ de lta bu'i tshul dang/ de lta bu'i mtshan mas dge 'dun la rtsod pa'i dge slong du mthong ba yin te/ de des ma grong nas gso sbyin 'gog
pan chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// ji ltar na dge 'dun la dmyas 'dogs pa'i gtam la zhugs pa yin zhen/ ji ltar yang de ni gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu'ang rung/ dge slong rnams 'dus te

tshany+tsA 'khod pa de dag kyang/ de las byung ba de dang mthun pa de'i rang bzhin gyi gtam la zhugs pa yin te/ dad pa las thos kyang rung/ bdag rang rnam pa la dogs pa skyes kyang rung sta/ de des thos pa dang/ de
lta bu'i dogs pas/ gso sbyin 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyin 'gog pa'o// chos bzhin bcu po 'di dag bzlog pa ni chos bzhinam yin par myur bar bya'o// gso sbyin dgag pa'i dngos po rdzogs so//
mdoran/ dge tshul lo ma lon pa gcig/ kha dog ngan dang gnas de bzhin// ma bskos pa dang phyag bya ba// mngon sum rngul gzanamang pa'o//
btsun pa dge tshul pha ni tshadabyar tshul du zhugs na/ de dag gis mal stan bgo bar bgyi lam/ u pa li ma yin no/ de dag gis mal stan blang bar bgyi 'am/ u pa li blang bar ni bya'o// btsun
pa 'khom lon pa dgaciganyetsho dbyar tshul du zhugs na// de dag gis mal stan bgo bar bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// dedag gis mal stan blang bar bgyi lan/ u pa li blang bar mi bya'o// btsun pa
dge slong gcig gam/ gnyis sam gsum mam/ bzhi dbyar tshul du zhugs n/ de dag gis mal stan bgo bar bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// dedug gis mal stan byung bar bgyi'am/ u ba
li khang ra ni bya'o// u pa li gang du dge slong lnga 'am de las lhag par gnas na/ de dag gis gsol ba byas la mal stan 'gyung pa skos shig/ bskos pa des mal stan bgo'o// btsun pamal stan de nyid

spyad pas nongs par 'gyur ba dang/ de nyid sbyad pas nongs pa rami 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ gang zag gi mal stanakha dog nganapar ma bsgyur ba ma/ khatshar ring ba spyad na nyes pa dang bcas
ba'o 3dge 'dun gyis spyad na nyes med do// btsun pabcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan gnas gzhan du khyer zhing ma song cig ces gsungs na/ btsun pa dge slong zhig gis
dge 'dun gyi mal stan gnas gzhan du'atshal te spyad na cir 'gyur/ nyes med do// bar chad brgyud las gang yang rung sta/ bar chad gcigakhyung bar gyur ba dang/ gnas de
nyid du ma' stan srung bar mi nus pa dang/ gnas der mi gnas par sdom pa bcas pa la ni shes pamadango// btsun pa ma bskos pas mal stan bgo bar bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// btsun pa dge slong
zhig gis dag 'dun gyi mal stan de nyid sbyang nanongs par 'gyur ba dang/ de nyid spyad pas nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ spu phyir bzlog ste gyonan nyes pa dang bcas pa'o// btingan
nyesamad do// rngul gzan med par gyonan nyes pa dang bcas ba'o// dzul gzan dang bcas par gyon tas mad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad du nye bar phyogs pa dang gnas par mi bya'o zhes
gsungs na/ btsunapa ci'u bar ma phyogs pas[︽]bar phyogs pa rgan pa la yang phyag bgyi 'am/ u pa lim yin te/ 'bar phyogs pa thams cad kyis nyebar ma phyogs pa rnams la phyag byos shig/ dge slong
rnams kyi bla mar gzhag ko/ btsun pa cidi dag la mal ston kyang dge slong de dag gi thamar stsal tam/ u pa li zhabar phyogs pa lared pa dang mal stanabyin pa mad do// bdun pa mngon sum du ma gyur
pa lama' stan stsal bar bgyi'am/ khacig la byin cig/ kha cig la ma sbyon cig/ gang la stsal bar bgyi 3 song nas phyir 'ong pa lani byinacig/ su la mi stsal song nas phyir mi 'ong ba la
kan nim sbyin cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi las rngul gzan ma mchis pa ma spyad cig ces gsungasan/ btsun pa dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi rdzas rngul gzan ma mchis
par sbyang kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yodade/ ji ltar yang de ni khyim bdag cig gis g.yog pa 'am/ bgo ba zhig rngul gzanamad par spyad par dge 'dun la phul ba yin no//
mdor na 3 kun dga' bo dang gang zag dang// de ltar phyag dang rung ba dang// thom dbyar du gnas pa dang// sum mdabri ba de bzhin te// khyim nga dag la so gas pa dang// bslab
byin ba tha ma 'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kun daga' bo khyod kyis mal stan lhagama'i rnams go zhigaces gsungs na/ lhag pa gang lags/ gang gcig dang gnyis po'i phyogs
las lhag par gyur pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge 'dun tshimal stan rdzal gnam mchis par ma sbyang cig cesagasungs na/ btsun pa dge slong gis gang zag gi mal stan spyad na
cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dang/ gzhi nga rnams ji ltar rgan rims bzhin phyag byos shig ces gsungasan/ btsun pa de ste chad
pa bgyid pa'i dge slong dge slong rgan pa la 'ang phyag bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li phyag bya ba'i mi rigs pa thams cad la phyagami bya ste/ khon yod pa ni ma gtogasaso//
dau pa li dge 'dun gyi nangan phyag bya ba'i mi rigs pa'i gang brag rnams gang zhen/ bsdigs pa'i las byas pa dang/ smad pa'i las byas pa dang/ bskrad pa'i las byas pa dang//

slar bsdum pa'i las byas ba dang/ mamathong ba'i phyir snga ba'i las byas pa dang/ las slar mkhyad pa'i phyir sngangs pa'i las byas pa dang/ sdig pa la lta ba sla ma spangs pa'i phyir spangs pa'i las byas pa
dang chadang byed pa dang/ gzhinas bslangs te chad pa byed pa dang/ chad pa 'khor ba dang/ yi dmagu bar byang skyod pa dang/ gzhi nas bslangs te yid mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang/ khyim pa dang/
mning dang/ dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang/ nga dang ma dang/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang/ mu stags can dang/ mu stags can du song pa dang/
rkun gnas dang/ mi gnas pa dang/ so sor gnas pa dang/ sngar zhus byung ba dang/ sngon 'khrugs pa dang/ 'bar phyogs pa dang/ bslab pastsal ba dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge slob ma dang/

dge tshulam dang/ dge tshul pa dang/ shin tu gzhon pa rnams la phyag ma byed cig/ bganang ba byed pa la phyagami bya'o// bshang ba byed pas phyag mi bya'o/ dag ci pa byed pa la phyag mi bya'o// kacib byed pas phug

mi bya'o// so shing zla ba la phyag mi bya'o// so shing za bas phyag mi bya'o// khras zla ba la phyag mi bya'o// rjes za bas phyag mi bya'o// 'byung nga la phyag mi bya'o// 'byung bas phyag mi bya'o// sgron mo la phyag
00 mi bya'o// sgron mos phyag mi bya'o// gos gcig pa la phyag mi bya'o// gos gcig pas phyag mi bya'o// mi snang bar 'dug pa la phyag mi bya'o// mi snang bar 'dug pas phyagami bya'o// mi bde/
bar 'dug pa la phyag mi bya'o// mi bde bar 'dug pas phyag mi bya'o// lung nod pa la zhugs pa 'am/ yid la byed pa la zhugs pa las/ chos nyanang ra zhugs pa la phyagami bya'o// lung nod pa
dang yid la byed pa dang/ chos nyan par zhugs pas phyagami bya'o// yangs pa la phyag mi bya'o// khyim gyi nang du zhugs pa la phyag mi bya ste/ gang zag 'di dag ni phyag mi bya ba'i dmigs pa'o//
btsun pa dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi khri 'am khri'u lamachis sam/ nyal kyang nongs pa ltang bar mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ mi rung ba la 'dug gam 3la ba// gang dge slong

rnams kyis spyad par mi rung ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gangachad pa bgyid pa'i dge slongani dge slonga rnams skyes pas bas ba ba thamar stsal tam/ u pa lim yin te/ rims kyis sbyin no// khatsun
pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dbyar med pa dang/ rangang zhin du gnas pa rnams lamal stan sngar byin cig/ de'i 'og tu sngangs pa'i rnams la'o zhes gsungs// de sta mal stan lhag par gyur na rang bzhin
du gnas pa dang lhan cig tu stsal tam/ u pa 'a ma sbyin no// btsun pa dge slong zhig gis gnas bzhi nas mal stan blangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li yod de/ ji ltar/
yang de ni dge slong zhig gis gnas bzhi'i mtshams shing ngam// yang na lang ga 'dam bu 'am/ re ldes mnan te dbyar tshul du zhugs pa yin no// btsunapa bcom ldan 'das kyis dag
rmul ba rnams la ni dpa'i sum byin cig ces gsungasan/ btsunapaci mal stan yang sumachastsal tam/ u pa li ma yin te/ skal bamanyam par byin cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
gang dge slong gsar bu rnams kyis/ rganapa rnams las sngon dumal stanam blang zhig ces gsungasan/ btsun pa dge slong gzhonanus rgan pa las sngar mal stan blabs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis
sam: u pa li yod de/ gang gis dge 'dun las gnas kyi gnang ba thob pa dang nyagayog gi gnang ba thob pa yin/ 'jigs pa'isanas bros 'ongs pa yin no// btsun pa khyim pa mal sta 'god par bsko
lam u pa li ma yin no// de bzhin du tham nas/ bslab pa stsal ba'i bar durgyas par mal stan 'godapar bsko 'an/ u pa ma yin no// btsun pa smon pa mal stan 'god pa bsko 'am/ na pa lem
yin no// de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang/ nad kyis gzir ba dang/ glen pa dang/ lhug ba dang/ 'onapa rnams so// btsun pa 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa ngagamal stana'agodar ra bsko ma/ u pa li/
ma yin no// btsun pa ma ning 'a mal stan stsal tam/ apa lim yin no// de bzhin du dge slong ma sun phyung banas sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag la mal stan stsal tam/ su pa'i ma yin no//
btsun pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang/ bslab pa stsal ba lamal stan stsal tam/ u pa li byin cig/ btsun pa smon pa la mal stan stsal tam/ u pa li de lta spyad pa bzhinaru mi spyod na ma sbyin/
cig de bzhin dusems 'khrugs padang/ nad kyis gzir ba dang/ glen pa dang/ skug pa dang/ 'onapa rnams la yang brjod par bya'o// btsunapa mal stana'agod par dge slong bsko ba'i tshoms/
'phosanabaskos pa zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li bskos pa zhes bya'o// desamal stan bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ u pa li ma yin no// mal stan gyi dngos po rdzogs so/// bamakho
nyer gcig ra/ mdor na/ gsum du byas pa'i gzu bo dang// rnam par zhi ba'i mtshan de bzhin// gso sbyin ngag gi mngon sum dug/ 'byung ba dag kyang de bzhin no///
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa gzu bo chos dudang ldan n 'dul ba 'dzin cing rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid nus pa lags/ u pa li bcu gcig ste//
bcu gcig gang zhen/ rtsod pa shes/ rtsod pa ci las byung ba shes/ rtsod pa bsdu ba shes/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi bshes/ rtsod pa shinatu zhi bas phyis mi 'byung bar shes/ byung ba shes/ bcas pa shes/

rjes su bcas pa shes/ dgag pa shes/ mngonapar rjes su gnang ba shes/ las byas pa dang ma byas pa shes pa ste/ u pa li chos bcu gcig po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i gzu bo ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa rtsod pa rnam par
@#/ zhi bar byed nus pa yin no// gzhan yang chos bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig po gang zhen/ nyes du shes/ nyes pa med pa shes/ nyes pa lci ba shes/ nyes pa yang bshes//
nyes pa byung ba shes/ nyes pa las byung ba shes/ 'dod pa'i phyir mi 'gro/ zhe sdang dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ gti mug gi phyir mi 'gro ba dang/ chadapa las bya ba dang mi bya ba shes pa ste/ u pa li bsu
gcig po 'di dag gis rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i bar du rgyas par ro// gzhan yang chos bcu gcig gi bar du sta/ bcu gcig po gang zhen/ mdo sde la mkhas pa yin/ 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ rnam par
'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ lungal zhugs pa yin/ mdo sde 'byed pa yin/ 'khrul pa mi 'dzin pa yin/ gsang ba'i tshig mi 'dzin pa yin/ gdonami za bar 'dzin pa yin/ tshigamang po mi 'dzin pa yin/
ngam bcas pa 'dzin pa yin/ lan gsum gyi bar du gzhog pa yin te/ u pa li chos bcu gcig po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i gzu bo ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar byed nus pa yin no// chos du

dang ldan pas rtsod pa shin tu zhi ba lags/ u pa li'i shu rtsa gcig ste/ rishu rtsa gcig ngo gang zhe na/ dge 'dun la bsko ba yin/ chos dang bcas pas rgyal ba'i bka' dang mthun pa yin/ phyogs dang parol gyi phyogs

kyi dge slong dag go bar byed pa yin/ rgolab dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong la chos dang mthunapas rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong la 'dul ba ma nyams par byed pa yin/ mi gtsang ba'i gang zag gi)sa pa dang ma bcas
pa yin/ khyung ba chu ma gsan pa yin/ bcas pa chud ma gsan pa yin/ rjes su bcas la chud ma gsan pa yin/ dgag pa chud ma gsan pa yin/ mngon par rjes su gnang bachud ma gsanapa yin/ nyes bachud
ma gsan pa yin/ rgol ba'i dge slong gi yi dam shin tu bzung ba yin/ lan 'dengs pa'i yi dam shin tu bzung ba yin/ mdo snga'i tshig kyang bastan pa yin/ 'dul ba'ang mthun pa yin/ chos kyisikardzasasu
bzung nga yin/ bskos nas rnam par zhi bar byed pa yin/ nyes pa ston pa yin/ chad pa'i las dmigs su bab pa yin/ rnam par dag pa ston pa yin/ chos dang/ 'dzul ba dang/ ston pa'i bstan pas

rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba yin te/ u pa li chos nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di rnams dang ldan na rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o// btsunupa rgol ba 'am slar rgol ba'i dge slong mtshan 'phos na rtsod pa zhi bzhes bgyi'am//

u pa li zhi ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsod pa byung ba byung ma thag tu rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos 'dun gyis rnam par zhi bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ btsunang rtsod parnam pa bzhi las gang

yang rung ste/ rtsod pa zhig byung na rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid pa'i chos 'dun ngo las/ gang yang rung ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid pa'i chos kyis rnam par zhi bar ma bgyis par rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u

pa li yod de/ de ni mthun pa'i gso sbyin no// btsun pa rtsod pa bzhi las gang yang rung sta/ rtsod pa zhig byungan rgol ba dang slar rgolaba'idage slong rnams las gang gi tshig bzung bar bgyi/ rganarims kyis gzung ngo/
btsun pa de sta gnyis ka'i lo grangs mnyaman gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi/ gangamang du nyos pa yin no// btsun pa de ste gnyis ka'ang gzhung la mtshungs par gyur na gang gi tshig/

gzung bar bgyi/ gang byung ba yin no// de sta gnyis ka byang bar gyur na gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi/ gang byung pa'ishas che ba yin te/ de'i tshog gis rtsod pa rnams rnam par zhi bar bya'o// btsunab bcom ldan

'dasakyis gang tshul shing mang pos rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba lus/ gang gi phyogs sa tshul shing gcig gis kyang lhag par gyuran/ de'i phyogs des rnam par zhi bar bya'o zhes gsungasan/ btsun pa des phyog

gnyis katshul shingamanyam par gyuran/ gang gi dbang gis rtsod pa rnams rnam par zhibar bgyi/ u pa li phyogs gang gi dge slong dag phal cher byung ba'ishas chab yin no// btsunapagang dge slong rnams rtsod pa dge

slong rnams kyis rna bar zhi bar bgyid mnus na/ btsun pa dge slong mas rnam par zhi bar bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li rung ngo// de bzhin du sngo lnga'i rnams kyang phan tshunugacig la gcig sgyur bar bya'o//
mdor na/ 'phrin pa spring yig lag brda dang/ gzhanazer ba dang gcig nas gcig/ skyonapasams 'khrugs na bdang// 'on klamakhyim ba dag la sogs// bslab pa byin pa thama'o// btsun ba 'phrin

gyis rtsod pa rnam par zhib bgyisan rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dunani 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// de bzhin du spring yig dang/ lag brda dang/ gzhanazer ba dang/ gcig

nas gcig tu brgyud de rnam par zhi bar bgyisan rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun stsonapa zhig gis rtsod pa rnam par zhib bgyisan

rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dunani 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang/ nad kyis gzer ba dang/ blonapa dang/ lhug pa dang/ 'onapa rnamA

kyis rnam par zhi bar bgyisan rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li rnam par zhi nga zhes bya sta/ dge 'dunani 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pakhyim pa zhig gis rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyis na rnam par zhib

zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dunani 'das pa dang bcas pa'o// btsun pa de bzhin du mnang nas/ bslab pa stsal b rnams kyi bar du rgyas par de dag gi rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi san

rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li rnam par zhi ba zhes byasdu/ dge 'dunani 'dasapa dang bcasapa'o// btsunang rgol ba 'am slar rgol ba dus bgyisan rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes gyi 'am/ u pa li rnam par

zhi ba zhes bya'o// de bzhinadu khyim pa lags par khas blangs pa nas/ bslab pa stsal ba lags pa'i bar du rgyas par khas blangs na rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li rnam par zhib zhes bya'o// btsun pa
rgol ba khamasar rgol ba'i dge slong mtshan 'phos nartsod pa rnam par zhib zhes bgyi 'am/ u pa li rnam par zhi pa zhes bya'o// rtsod pa'i dngos po rdzogasaso/// mdoban : bya 'byed dag
'dunaca co dang// thadad pa dang tshul bzhinadang// bskal pa ngan ma gro log/ dge 'dunadabye dngami mkhas pa'o/// btsun pa dag 'dun bye ba zhes kyang ba gyi//
btsunapa dge 'dun 'dus pa zhes kyang bgyin/ btsun pa dge 'dun bye ba gang lags/ u pa li gang dbyen byedang sa chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes/ 'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul ba ma yin par 'du
shes par gyur bzhin du/ des 'du shes bcabs/ bzod pa bcabs/ dad pa bcabs/ blo gros dang/ lta ba dang/ rtogs pa rnams bcabs te/ 'di skad du 'di ni chos so// 'di ni 'dul ba'o//
'din ston pas bstan pa'o zhes smras nas/ des dge slong dag la bsko/ yang dag par bsgo/ slob len du 'jug/ brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang rjes su bsgrubs te/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag las
